Title: What are my responsibilities as a Protected Account holder? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Payments/Keeping_Your_Payments_Secure/What_are_my_responsibilities_as_a_Protected_Account_holder%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:10:25.023121
Word Count: 273
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Do:
Download the GXS Bank app from official app stores only (Apple App store or Google Play Store).
Install your app and device updates promptly.
Install and maintain the latest anti-virus software on your device.
Change your passcode regularly and do not share it with anyone.
Read notifications that may be sent by the bank very carefully.
Report to GXS Bank immediately if you notice any unauthorised or erroneous transaction.
Keep your contact details (such as mobile number and email address) up to date with GXSÂ Bank so that we can send you transaction alerts.
Monitor your transaction alerts and account statements for any unauthorised and erroneous transactions.
Do not:
Disclose your banking credentials such as passcode and Singpass ID to anyone else for any purpose at all, including to initiate or execute payment transactions involving your account.
Use a passcode that can be easily guessed, such as your birthday, wedding day, or 123456.
Store or keep a record of your access code or Singpass ID in a way that allows any third party to easily misuse them.
Click on web links in push notifications or emails to access our website as these may be phishing attempts. Please always type our URL:Â www.gxs.com.sg/ into the browserâ€™s address bar.
Allow third parties to register their fingerprint or Face ID on your device.
The above practices are not exhaustive of all the measures you should take to protect your account. For further information, you can visit:
Terms of Use
Acceptable Use Policy
Security Tips
Deposit Account Terms
GXS FlexiLoan Terms and Conditions
For assistance on your Singpass access, do reach out to
Singpass Helpdesk
directly.

================================================================================

Title: Can I increase my fund transfer limit for my GXS Savings Account during the cooling-off period? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Payments/Cooling-Off_Period/Can_I_increase_my_fund_transfer_limit_for_my_GXS_Savings_Account_during_the_cooling-off_period%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:10:28.045420
Word Count: 51
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

You will not be able to increase your daily transfer limit during the 12-hour cooling-off period.
The cooling-off period is a security measure designed to prevent unauthorised changes to your daily transfer limits or personal information. Youâ€™ll need to wait until the cooling-off period has elapsed before increasing your transaction limit.

================================================================================

Title: How do I register / deregister for PayNow? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/GXS_Biz_Account_Payments/How_do_I_register_%2F%2F_deregister_for_PayNow%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:10:25.022377
Word Count: 146
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Linking or unlinking your GXS Biz Account with PayNow is straightforward with the GXS Bank app! Here's how:
1. Login to your GXS Bank app. Go to 'Profile'.
2. Under 'Profile', click 'Manage PayNow'.
To register for PayNow:
1. You can register for PayNow with your UEN and/or with a suffix.
2. The PayNow name will be populated according to your company name. This is what others will see when they search for you via UEN.
3. Click 'Confirm' and your registration is complete!
To deregister for PayNow:
In your profile, you will see the that are registered with PayNow. You can select which identifiers to deregister as below:
1. Tap the three dots on the right of the registered identifier.
2. Select 'Deregister' from the pop-up menu.
3. Click 'Yes' to confirm your deregistration. Weâ€™ve also added in 'No' if you change your mind :)

================================================================================

Title: How do I make monthly repayments for my GXS FlexiLoan Biz? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz/GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz_Repayment/How_do_I_make_monthly_repayments_for_my_GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:10:28.039794
Word Count: 112
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

We offer flexible ways for you to repay loans on your GXS FlexiLoan Biz Account. Choose the option that best suits you:
1.
Auto repayments (recommended)
: Due amounts are automatically deducted from your GXS Biz Account on the repayment due date by 6am (SGT). Please ensure ahead of time that your Biz Account balances are sufficient to allow for a successful deduction.
2.
Manual repayments
: You can manually initiate repayments from your GXS Biz Account at any time before or on the repayment due date.
3.
Repayment from a third-party bank account
: You can transfer funds via FAST from an external bank account to your GXS FlexiLoan Biz Account.

Title: How can I make payments after adding my GXS Debit Card and/or GXS FlexiCard to Google Pay? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Payments/Using_Google_Pay/How_can_I_make_payments_after_adding_my_GXS_Debit_Card_and%2F%2For_GXS_FlexiCard_to_Google_Pay%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:10:37.270148
Word Count: 147
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

You can make payments on your GXS Debit Card and/or GXS FlexiCard through Google Pay in the following 2 ways:
Pay with your phone in stores or at merchant POS terminals:
Unlock your phone where you've added your card on Google Pay.
Place your phone over the contactless reader.
You will see a tick mark on the screen accompanied by a soft tone and a subtle vibration to indicate a successful payment. You'll also be sent a notification for a successful card payment.
Please note this method is only applicable to NFC (Near Field Communication) capable devices. Please ensure your device has NFC capabilities before trying to make contactless payments using Google Pay.
Online checkout:
For any online merchant offering the Google Wallet or Google Pay as a payment method, you can simply choose this payment method to pay using your GXS Debit Card or GXS FlexiCard.

Title: When will I be able to transfer more than S$10,000? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Payments/Keeping_Your_Payments_Secure/When_will_I_be_able_to_transfer_more_than_S%2410%2C000%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:10:46.234699
Word Count: 54
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

For the first 14 days after opening your account, there is a daily transfer limit of S$10,000 within a 24-hour period.
For example, if you transfer S$2,000 at 3:00PM today, you will have up to S$8,000 remaining to transfer until 3:00PM tomorrow.
After the initial 14 days, this transfer limit will no longer apply!

================================================================================

Title: How do I add my GXS Debit Card and/or GXS FlexiCard to Google Pay? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Payments/Using_Google_Pay/How_do_I_add_my_GXS_Debit_Card_and%2F%2For_GXS_FlexiCard_to_Google_Pay%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:10:49.097855
Word Count: 147
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Add your GXS Debit Card and/or GXS FlexiCard to Google Pay in 5Â simple steps as follows:
1. Open your Google Pay App and tap on the profile icon on the upper right corner.
2. Tap to add a debit card or credit card as a payment method.
3. Add your card details manually, along with your address details required by Google Pay.
4. Read through terms and conditions and tap on 'Accept'.
5. Select the authentication method (SMS or email) and authenticate yourself.
You card is now added to Google Pay and can be used to make card payments. You can make your GXS Debit Card or GXS FlexiCard as the default card for payments via Google Pay.
In addition to our Card Account Terms, your use of your card through Google Pay will be subject to separate terms and conditions between you and Google Pay.

================================================================================

Title: What are the fees I need to pay for my GXS FlexiLoan Biz? - GXS Help Centre

Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:10:49.405621
Word Count: 43
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

There are zero fees involved for your GXS FlexiLoan Biz - be it early repayment fees, processing fees or late fees.
While there are no fees, you will still be charged late interest for late repayments. Simply pay on time to avoid this.

Title: How do you derive the 2% cashback in GrabCoins? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/GXS_Debit_Card_2_percent_GrabRewards_points_campaign/How_do_you_derive_the_2percent_cashback_in_GrabRewards_points%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:11:01.385435
Word Count: 139
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

The issuance of GrabCoins are based on the currency charges on Grab and converted into Singapore Dollars (SGD) based on the following exchange rates, which are fixed and used throughout this campaign period to award GrabCoins:
Example of how it works:
When John spends MYR20 on a Grab ride in Malaysia with his GXS Debit Card, hereâ€™s how his rewards are calculated:
Exchange rate: SGD to MYR exchange rate is fixed at 3.3294
Currency Conversion: MYR20 Ã· 3.3294 = SGD6.01.
Reward Rate: 2% of SGD6.01 is equivalent to 60 GrabCoins (â‰ˆ SGD 0.12); as every 500 GrabCoins you earn can be used to offset S$1 of your purchases.
The exchange rates above only apply for awarding GrabCoins under this Campaign. Mastercard exchange rates will apply for GXS Debit Card transactions.
Please refer
here
for the campaign terms and conditions.

================================================================================

Title: What is the period required to deposit and maintain the fresh funds for the GXS Business Banking CNY2025 Cashback Campaign? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz/Chinese_New_Year_2025_Campaign/What_is_the_period_required_to_deposit_and_maintain_the_fresh_funds_for_the_GXS_Business_Banking_CNY2025_Cashback_Campaign%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:11:04.561418
Word Count: 101
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

In order to be eligible for the S$88 cashback reward, you must deposit the fresh funds into your GXS Biz Account by 28 February 2025, and ensure a day end balance of at least S$10,000 on 31 May 2025.
Do note that the cashback reward is limited to the first 500 eligible customers. The first 500 customers are selected on a first-come, first-served basis among those who meet the criteria by either depositing fresh funds into their GXS Biz Account or borrowing a loan from their GXS FlexiLoan Biz account.
For the full promotion Terms and Conditions, do refer
here
.

Title: Why canâ€™t I transfer more than S$10,000 from my GXS Savings Account? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Payments/Keeping_Your_Payments_Secure/Why_can%E2%80%99t_I_transfer_more_than_S%2410%2C000_from_my_GXS_Savings_Account%3F

Word Count: 54
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

With the increasing number of scams in Singapore, weâ€™ve put in a temporary measure to safeguard your funds.
What does this mean for you:
For the first 14 days after you've opened a GXS Savings Account, there is a daily transfer limit of S$10,000 within a 24-hour period.
All other account functions remain unchanged.

Title: How do I close my GXS Invest account? - GXS Help Centre

Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:11:16.233421
Word Count: 92
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Before closing your GXS Invest account, please ensure that you have sold all your existing investment units. Also, you will not be able to reinstate or reapply for a GXS Invest Account once you've closed your account.
We also encourage you to download all/any monthly statements as you may no longer be able to access your previous statements once your account is closed.
Once you've done this, reach out to us to close your GXS Invest account via:
- GXS Bank app, Help Centre: GXS Chat
- GXS Hotline: (+65) 3105 2055

Is FAQ Answer: True

Title: How do I change my mailing / residential address? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Update_Personal_Details/How_do_I_change_my_mailing_%2F%2F_residential_address%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:11:39.706570
Word Count: 153
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

To update your mailing address:
1. On homepage of the GXS Bank app, click on 'Me' tab on bottom right.
2. Select 'Edit Profile' and click on edit icon for 'Mailing Address'.
You will be prompted to verify your identity through biometrics (e.g. Touch or Face ID) or passcode. Key in your new mailing address and save to complete the update.
To update your residential address, please send us a copy of the following documents (dated within the last 3 months):
Utilities / telecommunication bill or
Bank / credit card statement or
Government correspondences or
NRIC
To submit your supporting documents, please follow these steps:
1. From the homescreen of the GXS Bank app, tap on Help Centre (the icon is in the top right corner).
2. Select 'Submit an enquiry'.
3. Describe your request and attach your documents.
Your request will be processed within 2 working days upon receipt of your documents.

Title: How does Singpass Face Verification work? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Using_the_App/How_does_Singpass_Face_Verification_work%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:11:59.506828
Word Count: 83
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

The process of Singpass Face Verification involves several steps to ensure the security and accuracy of identity authentication.
During the verification process, users are prompted to take a live photo using their device's camera. This photo is then compared against the government's records (CPF Board).
Do note that it is important to have the Singpass app installed on your device in order to use the face verification feature.
For a detailed step on the process, you can also refer to
Singpass Helpdesk
.

================================================================================

Title: Why canâ€™t I access the GXS Bank app on my phone? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Using_the_App/Why_can%E2%80%99t_I_access_the_GXS_Bank_app_on_my_phone%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:12:02.529493
Word Count: 193
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

We have recently enhanced the security measures on the GXS Bank app. To ensure that our app remains secure and equipped with the latest features, you will need to update your phone operating system (OS) by 15 December 2024.
Please consider the following options:
Upgrade your phoneâ€™s OS: Check your device settings for available updates and install the latest version (minimum version supported: iOS 14 and Android 8)
Consider switching to a new device: Upgrade to a new phone that supports the latest and most secure OS.
Do note: Phones that are running on OS versions lower than those stated above will no longer be supported by the bank.
In addition to safeguarding your data and credentials, the GXS Bank app will not run on a rooted, jailbroken device or on non-generally available platforms (e.g. private developer beta and public beta).
If you've upgraded your mobile device to beta iOS/Android platforms, you should roll back the update to continue accessing the GXS Bank app.
If you're unable to roll back the update, you can log in to the GXS Bank app using another phone. This will however, require you to re-authenticate your identity.

================================================================================

Title: What data does GXS Bank receive from Singpass and what do you use it for? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Your_Data_Privacy/What_data_does_GXS_Bank_receive_from_Singpass_and_what_do_you_use_it_for%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:12:05.784159
Word Count: 77
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

With your consent, GXS receives the necessary information from Singpass Myinfo to onboard you as our customer. Here's the list of data required from Singpass Myinfo:
Full Name
Alias Name
Hanyu Pinyin Name
Nationality
Citizenship
Date of Birth
Country of Birth
Sex
Marital Status
NRIC
Passport Number
Passport Expiry Date
FIN
FIN Expiry Date
Occupation
Name of employer
Annual Income Range
For GXS Business Banking account applicants, your ACRA information will also be shared with GXS Bank.

Title: How is my GXS account(s) protected? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Keeping_Your_Data_and_Device_Secure/How_is_my_GXS_account(s)_protected%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:12:30.247305
Word Count: 164
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Your data and account security are our utmost priority. To protect your account and information, we've set up a multi-layered defence against fraud.
We employ secure technology and protocols to keep your information and money safe. For example, only one device can access your GXS account at any time. Logging in to your GXS account on a new device will automatically deregister your old device.
We've established a dedicated anti-fraud team to monitor and review fraud alerts, and for intervention work.
We screen all transactions with our advanced monitoring and surveillance systems to detect unusual activities on our customers' accounts. This helps us prevent or interveneÂ potential unauthorised transactions.
Apart from these measures, it's crucial to stay vigilant against fraud and scams. If you have questions or concerns, feel free to reach us at:
GXS app, Help Centre: GXS Chat (Recommended)
GXS app, Help Centre: Submit an enquiry
GXS Hotline: 1800 866 6685 or (+65) 6866 6685 (from overseas)
GXS Customer Support Email:
help@gxs.com.sg

Title: What are the E-Payments User Protection Guidelines? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/Keeping_your_GXS_Biz_Account_Payments_and_Money_Secure/What_are_the_E-Payments_User_Protection_Guidelines%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:12:44.657375
Word Count: 243
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

The Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) has issued these Guidelines on the roles and responsibilities of banks and customers when it comes to Electronic Payments (E-Payments).
The Guidelines establish a common baseline protection that Financial Institutions will provide to individuals and sole proprietors from losses arising from unauthorised or erroneous e-payment transactions from their protected accounts.
What is a protected account?
In the Guidelines, protected accounts are:
Held by either individuals or sole proprietors (business owners), including those held jointly by multiple account holders, and can hold a balance of S$500 or more at any time or is a credit facility and is capable of being used for E-Payment transactions
What E-Payments do the Guidelines cover?
The Guidelines cover all payments initiated through electronic means, and funds received through electronic means. These include online payments and transfers.
How do the Guidelines protect me?
As an E-Payments user, the Guidelines set out your responsibilities to adopt good security practices. These include how you should protect your device, login credentials, access codes and protected accounts.
We send you transaction notifications so youâ€™re alerted of unauthorised transactions. There are also multiple channels of reaching us if you need to report any unauthorised transactions.
We will investigate claims of unauthorised transactions, with the aim of achieving a fair and reasonable resolution.
You can read about the Guidelines listed down by MAS and FAQs by ABS below.
E-Payment Guidelines from MAS:
www.mas.gov.sg/regulation/guidelines/guidelines-for-e-payments-user-protection
E-Payment Guidelines FAQ from ABS:
www.abs.org.sg/consumer-banking/consumers/faq---e-payment-guidelines

================================================================================

Singpass Helpdesk
directly.

Title: What can I do to protect my mobile device? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Keeping_Your_Data_and_Device_Secure/What_can_I_do_to_protect_my_mobile_device%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:12:50.156993
Word Count: 97
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Here are 3 ways you can protect your mobile device:
Set up automatic updates for your device's applications and operating systems. This is to ensure you have the newest security patches and bug fixes to secure your device and data
Download apps only from the official Google Play Store or the Apple App Store. Be sure to read the reviews and ratings too. Unverified or unsupported apps can be carriers of security vulnerabilities.
Lastly, do not set passwords that are easy to guess or are related to your personal details, such as your birthday or NRIC number.

Title: What happens if my account balance drops below S$100,000 even for one day? - GXS Help Centre

However, you will still receive the usual daily interest of 1.08% p.a.

Title: What is the complimentary Group Personal Accident Coverage? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/Complimentary_SingLife_Insurance/What_is_the_complimentary_Group_Personal_Accident_Coverage%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:12:59.330120
Word Count: 130
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Eligible customers who purchase the Fullerton SGD Cash Fund - Class G through GXS Bank will receive a complimentary Group Personal Accident insurance coverage, underwritten by Singapore Life Ltd (Singlife) and will be insured up to 3 times the investment amount in the event of death or Total and Permanent Disability, subject to a maximum of S$100,000.
â€œInvestment amountâ€ refers to the market value of the Fullerton SGD Cash Fund as of the day of the accident. The market value will be determined by multiplying the units owned by you by the Unit Price as of the day of accident.
If you are 65 age next birthday and above at the time of accident, the coverage would be reduced to 50% of benefits payable, subject to a maximum of S$50,000.

================================================================================

Title: What should I do if Singpass Face Verification fails? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Using_the_App/What_should_I_do_if_Singpass_Face_Verification_fails%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:13:11.943769
Word Count: 120
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

There are several steps you can take to troubleshoot and resolve the issue:
Check Lighting and Visibility:
Ensure that your face is well-lit and clearly visible. Poor lighting conditions can interfere with the face recognition process.
Remove any accessories that might obscure your face, such as sunglasses, hats, or masks. These can prevent the system from getting a clear view of your face features.
Camera Functionality:
Make sure your device's camera is functioning properly. Clean the camera lens to ensure there are no smudges or dirt affecting the image quality.
Verify that your camera is not damaged and is capable of capturing clear images.
Reference:
https://ask.gov.sg/singpass/question...agencyhomepage

Title: What are the referral cashback rewards I can earn from the â€˜Refer a Friendâ€™ campaign? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/'Refer_a_Friend'_campaign/What_are_the_referral_cashback_rewards_I_can_earn_from_the_%E2%80%98Refer_a_Friend%E2%80%99_campaign%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:13:21.851351
Word Count: 113
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

For every friend you successfully refer who opens a GXS Savings Account, you will receive a S$5 cashback reward.
If your friend opens a GXS FlexiLoan or GXS FlexiCard, both you and your friend will each receive a S$10 cashback reward.
However, it's important to note that as the referrer, you can only receive a maximum of S$10 cashback reward per friend, no matter how many different accounts your friend opens.
Your referee has to successfully open the GXS Bank product by 30 June 2025, and only the first 10,000 successful referrals during the campaign period will be eligible. So be sure to do it now!

Terms and Conditions

Title: How can I safeguard my data? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Keeping_Your_Data_and_Device_Secure/How_can_I_safeguard_my_data%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:13:17.885238
Word Count: 107
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Scammers adapt their tactics to different victims, so it's important to remain vigilant. Here are some tips to help you avoid online banking scams:
Do not click on links in unsolicited SMSes or emails.
Call us at 1800 866 6685 or (+65) 6866 6685 (from overseas) to verify unsolicited SMSes or emails.
Never ever share your banking details or passwords with anyone.
Secure your device with a strong password to prevent unauthorised access.
Turn on your mobile notifications to be alerted on any account activities. You should also check your transaction records regularly so that any unauthorised transactions can be prevented or reported as soon as possible.

Title: What are the benefits of using Singpass Face Verification? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Using_the_App/What_are_the_benefits_of_using_Singpass_Face_Verification%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:13:32.943182
Word Count: 122
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

There are several key benefits to using Singpass Face Verification, each contributing to a more secure and convenient user experience:
Security
: It provides a high level of security by ensuring that the person attempting to access the service is the legitimate user.
Convenience
: Users can authenticate their identity quickly and easily without needing to remember passwords or carry physical identification documents.
Integration
: It is seamlessly integrated with various services that require identity verification, making it a versatile tool for both personal and business use.
Overall, Singpass Face Verification offers a robust, secure, and user-friendly method for identity authentication, enhancing the digital experience for GXS Bank users.
For more information on Singpass Face Verification, you can refer to
Singpass Helpdesk.

Title: What is the cut-off time for Buy or Sell orders? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/GXS_Invest_Orders/What_is_the_cut-off_time_for_Buy_or_Sell_orders%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:13:42.628497
Word Count: 135
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

This is the specific time on a given dealing day that your transaction will be considered for that day's value. Itâ€™s important to know this time so you can plan and ensure your transaction is recorded correctly. The cut-off time to transact on GXS Invest is 3:30pm every business day.
For Buy orders placed before 3:30pm, your allocated units will be reflected in your account on the next business day.
For Buy orders placed after 3:30pm or on a non-business day, your allocated units will be reflected in your account the following business day instead.
For Sell orders placed before 3:30pm, you will receive your proceeds on the next business day.
For Sell orders placed after 3:30pm or on a non-business day, you can generally expect to receive your proceeds the following business day instead.

================================================================================

Singpass
).

Singpass Helpdesk
.

================================================================================

Logging in to your GXS Bank app is simple!
On a new device
Open the GXS Bank app and follow the onscreen instructions. To access your account, youâ€™ll have to verify your identity via Singpass, email OTP and passcode. The good news is youâ€™ll only have to do this once on a new device. After verification, your device becomes a registered device and future logins will be quick and easy. Do note that you can only have one registered device at any one time.
On your registered device
Open the GXS Bank app and key in your 6-digit passcode. You can also use Face ID or Touch ID to log in if your device has that function.

Title: What is the eligibility criteria of the Group Personal Accident coverage? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/Complimentary_SingLife_Insurance/What_is_the_eligibility_criteria_of_the_Group_Personal_Accident_coverage%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:14:00.052418
Word Count: 107
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

You are eligible for the insurance coverage if you meet the following requirements:
- You are between 19 and 75 years old Age Next Birthday (both ages inclusive);
- You are a unitholder of the Fullerton SGD Cash Fund (Share Class G) purchased through GXS Bank Pte. Ltd.;
- You are a Singaporean citizen, Singapore Permanent Resident or holders of valid Singapore employment pass but excludes work permit holders;
- You are a resident of Singapore;
- You are not a Prohibited Person (as defined in the Insurance Product Summary); and
- Your application for cover under this Group Personal Accident Plan has been approved by Singlife

Title: What is Singpass Face Verification? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Using_the_App/What_is_Singpass_Face_Verification%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:14:01.823521
Word Count: 85
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Singpass Face Verification is designed to provide a convenient and secure way for users to access various government and private sector services in Singapore. This method enhances security by adding an additional layer of authentication beyond traditional passwords or PINs.
The process typically involves the user taking a live photo or scanning their face using their device's camera. The system then compares this live image against the government's records (CPF Board).
For more information on Singpass Face Verification, you can refer to
Singpass Helpdesk
.

================================================================================

Title: How do I reset my GXS Bank app passcode? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Using_the_App/How_do_I_reset_my_GXS_Bank_app_passcode%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:14:04.653084
Word Count: 150
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

If you've forgotten your passcode,
There are 2 ways to reset your passcode on the GXS Bank app:
On your current device:
1. On the login screen, tap 'Forgot Passcode?'
2. You will be prompted to verify your identity on Singpass before you can reset your passcode.
3. After logging into GXS, you will then be required to create a new GXS passcode.
On a new device:
Verify your identity via Singpass. An OTP will be sent to your registered email address.
Tap 'Forgot Passcode?'
Key in the OTP that is sent to your registered mobile number and you can reset your passcode.
If you'd just like to change your passcode,
Tap 'Me'.
Select 'Change Passcode' under 'Settings'.
You will need to key in your current passcode before you can update to a new one.
If you are encountering issues with your Singpass login, do have a read
here
.

Title: Will I be charged a fee for my request to access my personal data? - GXS Help Centre

Title: How can I access my personal data? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Your_Data_Privacy/How_can_I_access_my_personal_data%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:14:07.465429
Word Count: 78
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Accessing your personal data is easy. Just log into your GXS Bank app and click on your profile button. If you need to access other personal data, please contact us (GXS Customer Support Email: help@gxs.com.sg) with the following information and documents listed below:
Types of personal data, the data and time of requested data, and how the personal data was collected.
Reasons for the request.
Any preferred format and mode of receiving the requested personal data (e.g. email).

Title: What should I do if Singpass Face Verification fails? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Using_the_App/What_should_I_do_if_Singpass_Face_Verification_fails%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:14:14.870140
Word Count: 120
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

There are several steps you can take to troubleshoot and resolve the issue:
Check Lighting and Visibility:
Ensure that your face is well-lit and clearly visible. Poor lighting conditions can interfere with the face recognition process.
Remove any accessories that might obscure your face, such as sunglasses, hats, or masks. These can prevent the system from getting a clear view of your face features.
Camera Functionality:
Make sure your device's camera is functioning properly. Clean the camera lens to ensure there are no smudges or dirt affecting the image quality.
Verify that your camera is not damaged and is capable of capturing clear images.
Reference:
https://ask.gov.sg/singpass/question...agencyhomepage
If the issue persists, you may need to contact
Singpass Helpdesk
for further assistance.

================================================================================

Title: What happens if I change my appearance significantly? - GXS Help Centre

Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:14:16.157685
Word Count: 63
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

This ensures that the Singpass Face Verification process continues to work accurately and efficiently.

Singpass Helpdesk
.

Title: How do I change my mailing / residential address? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Update_Personal_Details/How_do_I_change_my_mailing_%2F%2F_residential_address%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:14:21.818969
Word Count: 153
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

To update your mailing address:
1. On homepage of the GXS Bank app, click on 'Me' tab on bottom right.
2. Select 'Edit Profile' and click on edit icon for 'Mailing Address'.
You will be prompted to verify your identity through biometrics (e.g. Touch or Face ID) or passcode. Key in your new mailing address and save to complete the update.
To update your residential address, please send us a copy of the following documents (dated within the last 3 months):
Utilities / telecommunication bill or
Bank / credit card statement or
Government correspondences or
NRIC
To submit your supporting documents, please follow these steps:
1. From the homescreen of the GXS Bank app, tap on Help Centre (the icon is in the top right corner).
2. Select 'Submit an enquiry'.
3. Describe your request and attach your documents.
Your request will be processed within 2 working days upon receipt of your documents.

================================================================================

Title: What is Singpass Face Verification? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Using_the_App/What_is_Singpass_Face_Verification%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:14:33.332598
Word Count: 85
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Singpass Face Verification is designed to provide a convenient and secure way for users to access various government and private sector services in Singapore. This method enhances security by adding an additional layer of authentication beyond traditional passwords or PINs.
The process typically involves the user taking a live photo or scanning their face using their device's camera. The system then compares this live image against the government's records (CPF Board).
For more information on Singpass Face Verification, you can refer to
Singpass Helpdesk
.

================================================================================

Title: Can I change my guess amount and when is the guess amount locked in? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/Pocket_is_Right_campaign/Can_I_change_my_guess_amount_and_when_is_the_guess_amount_locked_in%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:14:47.690707
Word Count: 79
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Yes, you can change your guess amount anytime during the guess period by depositing more funds or withdrawing funds from your Saving Pocket.
Your guess amount will be locked based on the day end balance on the last day of the month, less any interest credited.
You will then have to hold the fresh funds amount for the hold period of 1 month. Winners of the Grand Prize will be announced on the 30th day of the next month.

================================================================================

Title: I am an existing customer and already have S$100,000 in my GXS Biz Account. Am I eligible to participate in this campaign? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/GXS_Biz_Account_2025_Year-End_Promotion/I_am_an_existing_customer_and_already_have_S%24100%2C000_in_my_GXS_Biz_Account._Am_I_eligible_to_participate_in_this_campaign%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:14:33.410027
Word Count: 37
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Yes. To qualify, you must deposit an additional S$100,000 in fresh funds into your GXS Biz Account between 11 November and 31 December 2025 and maintain your balance for 60 days from the date of depositing funds.

Title: How much fresh funds should I bring in to take part? - GXS Help Centre

Word Count: 36
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

The amount of fresh funds needed has to be equivalent or more than the guess amount.
For e.g., your guess is $3,868.88. The amount of fresh funds needed has to be equivalent or more than $3,868.88.

Title: Is there a detailed guide I can refer to for opening a GXS Biz Account? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/Open_a_GXS_Biz_Account/Is_there_a_detailed_guide_I_can_refer_to_for_opening_a_GXS_Biz_Account%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:15:02.955207

Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Hereâ€™s a step-by-step guide to opening a GXS Biz Account, once youâ€™ve received an invite from us.
Search for 'GXS Bank'Â in Apple Store or Google Play Store. Download the latest version and launch it.
You should then see the options to view Personal banking or Business banking.
Tap on 'Business banking' and the next page should show you the GXS Biz Account. Tap on â€˜Sign Up Nowâ€™ to begin the application process.
You'll then be asked to log in with your Singpass details, in order for your personal and ACRA information to be shared with GXS Bank.
Once youâ€™ve provided your consent and approval, the next few screens will display your personal and company information retrieved from Singpass MyInfo and ACRA respectively.
Tap on â€˜Nextâ€™ accordingly.
Do check the information displayed to ensure that the information retrieved is valid and accurate. If you'd like to change the pre-filled information at anytime, just tap the arrow down on the right of the screen to display the dropdown options.
Next, we'd like to know more about your business information. When you encounter this next screen below, just fill in the details accordingly.
Purpose of business - Do pick the option closest to your line of business. If in doubt, select â€˜Othersâ€™ and there will be a text-based field for you to key in.
Annual business income - Select a range from â€˜less than $100,000â€™ to â€˜more than $1,000,000'.
Anticipated level of account activity - We would like to know how often you may need to make a deposit or withdrawal of your GXS Biz Account. Select a range from 0 to above 1,000 transactions.
Anticipated amount of each transaction - For each deposit or withdrawal made in your GXS Biz Account, we would like to know the average amount of each transaction.
Source of funds - If in doubt, select â€˜Othersâ€™ and there will be a text-based field for you to key in.
Youâ€™re nearly done!
Tap on â€˜Get Bothâ€™ if youâ€™d like to proceed with the bundled application. Or if you prefer to proceed with just a savings account for now, just tap on â€˜Get GXS Biz Accountâ€™.
If your application is showing this message, don't worry. We may simply need a bit more time to assess your eligibility.
Just sit back, relax and wait for a notification from us within 2 business days.
If at any point you require further clarification or assistance, our Customer Support Team is here for you 24/7. Just reach out to us via:
GXS app, Help Centre: GXS Chat (Recommended)
GXS app, Help Centre: Submit an enquiry
GXS Hotline: 1800 866 6685 or (+65) 6866 6685 (from overseas)

help@gxs.com.sg

Title: Are my GXS Biz Account deposits with GXS Bank protected or insured? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/Fund_GXS_Biz_Account/Are_my_GXS_Biz_Account_deposits_with_GXS_Bank_protected_or_insured%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:15:05.942001
Word Count: 72
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Your deposits in your GXS Biz Account are insured up to S$100,000 by the Singapore Deposit Insurance Corporation (SDIC), under the Deposit Insurance Scheme. Here's a description of the scheme:
Singapore dollar deposits of non-bank depositors are insured by the Singapore Deposit Insurance Corporation, for up to S$100,000 in aggregate per depositor per Scheme member by law. Foreign currency deposits, dual currency investments, structured deposits and other investment products are not insured.

================================================================================

Title: What happens if my account balance drops below S$100,000 even for one day? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/GXS_Biz_Account_2025_Year-End_Promotion/What_happens_if_my_account_balance_drops_below_S%24100%2C000_even_for_one_day%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:14:52.090657
Word Count: 52
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Your end-of-day account balance must remain at or above S$100,000 for 60 consecutive days. If the end-of-day balance drops below this amount at any time during the 60-day period, you will not be eligible for the reward under this promotion.
However, you will still receive the usual daily interest of 1.08% p.a.

================================================================================

Title: Are GXS Biz Account e-statements considered certified or authorised statements? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/GXS_Biz_Account_Statements/Are_GXS_Biz_Account_e-statements_considered_certified_or_authorised_statements%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:15:08.771610
Word Count: 39
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

The e-statements available in your GXS Bank app are soft copies of your account statements, which you can print if needed. They will not have a signature since they are system generated documents, and are not certified true copies.

================================================================================

Title: How do you derive the 2% cashback in GrabCoins? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/GXS_Debit_Card_2_percent_GrabRewards_points_campaign/How_do_you_derive_the_2percent_cashback_in_GrabRewards_points%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:14:55.175346
Word Count: 139
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

The issuance of GrabCoins are based on the currency charges on Grab and converted into Singapore Dollars (SGD) based on the following exchange rates, which are fixed and used throughout this campaign period to award GrabCoins:
Example of how it works:
When John spends MYR20 on a Grab ride in Malaysia with his GXS Debit Card, hereâ€™s how his rewards are calculated:
Exchange rate: SGD to MYR exchange rate is fixed at 3.3294
Currency Conversion: MYR20 Ã· 3.3294 = SGD6.01.
Reward Rate: 2% of SGD6.01 is equivalent to 60 GrabCoins (â‰ˆ SGD 0.12); as every 500 GrabCoins you earn can be used to offset S$1 of your purchases.
The exchange rates above only apply for awarding GrabCoins under this Campaign. Mastercard exchange rates will apply for GXS Debit Card transactions.
Please refer
here
for the campaign terms and conditions.

================================================================================

Title: Can I get more clues for the â€˜Pocket is Rightâ€™ campaign? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/Pocket_is_Right_campaign/Can_I_get_more_clues_for_the_%E2%80%98Pocket_is_Right%E2%80%99_campaign%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:15:11.638049
Word Count: 16
Is FAQ Answer: True

Title: How is the randomised sure-win cash reward determined? - GXS Help Centre

Title: Can I change my guess amount and when is the guess amount locked in? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/Pocket_is_Right_campaign/Can_I_change_my_guess_amount_and_when_is_the_guess_amount_locked_in%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:15:15.913340
Word Count: 79
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Yes, you can change your guess amount anytime during the guess period by depositing more funds or withdrawing funds from your Saving Pocket.
Your guess amount will be locked based on the day end balance on the last day of the month, less any interest credited.
You will then have to hold the fresh funds amount for the hold period of 1 month. Winners of the Grand Prize will be announced on the 30th day of the next month.

================================================================================

Title: What is the Notice for the 'Cancellation Period for Collective Investment Schemes Constituted as Unit Trusts'? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/7_Day_Cancellation_Period/What_is_the_Notice_for_the_'Cancellation_Period_for_Collective_Investment_Schemes_Constituted_as_Unit_Trusts'%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:15:38.317749
Word Count: 110
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

In accordance with the requirements under the MAS Notice on Cancellation Period for Units in Authorised Collective Investment Scheme, you have the right to cancel your buy order within 7 calendar days from the date of purchase.
If the last day of the cancellation period falls on a Sunday or public holiday in Singapore, the cancellation period will be extended to the next business day.
If you have existing holdings in this fund or this is your second or subsequent buy order in this fund, the right to cancel will not apply, unless your second or subsequent Buy order was made within the 7-day cancellation period of your first order.

================================================================================

Title: Can I make multiple deposits to reach the S$100,000 requirement? - GXS Help Centre

Yes. For new customers, your 60-day period will begin on the day your total account balance first meets or exceeds S$100,000. For existing customers, your 60-day period will begin on the day you deposit a total of S$100,000 in fresh funds within the campaign period.

Title: How do I close my GXS FlexiLoan Biz account? - GXS Help Centre

Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:15:50.567524
Word Count: 117
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

We're sad to see you go! Do note that the closure is permanent, and you will not be able to reinstate or reapply for GXS FlexiLoan Biz again once you have closed the account.

GXS app, Help Centre: GXS Chat (Recommended)

Title: I earn interest daily on my Saving Pockets, are they factored in the guess amount? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/Pocket_is_Right_campaign/I_earn_interest_daily_on_my_Saving_Pockets%2C_are_they_factored_in_the_guess_amount%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:15:30.951086
Word Count: 78
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

No, interest credited will not be included in your guess amount. Only the nett amount - the total amount you deposited minus the total amount you withdrew during the guess period will be considered your final guess amount.
For e.g. you deposit S$5,000.00 on 5 April, withdraw S$1,000.00 on 20 April and earn interest of S$8.00 for the month.
At the end of the day of 30 April, your guess amount will be S$5,000.00 minus S$1,000.00 = S$4,000.00.

================================================================================

Title: Can I schedule future or recurring FAST/ PayNow transfers? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/GXS_Biz_Account_Payments/Can_I_schedule_future_or_recurring_FAST%2F%2F_PayNow_transfers%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:16:05.755312
Word Count: 94
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Yes, you can definitely schedule one-time or recurring FAST/PayNow transfers for a future date. Hereâ€™s how to do it in the GXS Bank app:
1. Open your GXS Bank app.
2. Tap on "Send Money" on the top bar.
3. Select method of transfer.
4. Enter the recipient's Account number or proxy details.
5. Under "Types of transfers", choose "Scheduled transfer" and enter a name for the scheduled transfer.
6. Select the transfer frequency.
7. Set the start date.
8. Select number of times to transfer.
9. Review and approve the transfer schedule summary.

Title: What are the fees charged on my investments? - GXS Help Centre

Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:16:12.188051
Word Count: 131
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

GXS Bank does not charge any transaction fees when you buy or sell the Fullerton SGD Cash Fund through us. This means there are no front-end sales charges, withdrawal fees or platform fees, and we ensure that your full investment is put to work, and 100% of your money is actively invested.
The annual management fee is already factored into each dealing day's published unit price, and there are no further deductions made when units in the fund are bought or sold.
For more information on fees, you may refer to the Fee Schedule that can be found in the GXS Bank app. To access the fund documents:
1. Log in to your GXS Bank App.
2. Proceed to the GXS Invest homescreen.
3. Tap on â€˜Moreâ€™.
4. Select â€˜Fee Scheduleâ€™.

Title: As a new investor in GXS Invest, what are some of the risks that I need to be aware of? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/General_Risk_Disclosures/As_a_new_investor_in_GXS_Invest%2C_what_are_some_of_the_risks_that_I_need_to_be_aware_of%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:16:23.824195
Word Count: 345
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Before making an informed decision to purchase an investment product, please read through the following risk disclosures. It is important that you understand and acknowledge them before making your purchase.
1) All investments come with risks, and you may lose all or part of your investment. Investments are not deposits and should not be treated as deposits.
2) You have received, read and understood the relevant prospectus or other offering document and, where applicable, the product highlights sheet or other materials or documents relating to the investment product which you are applying to invest into, and agree to be bound by the prospectus and offering and constitutive documents of the investment product.
3) Past performance of an investment does not necessarily reflect its future performance. Any indicative return and/or distribution rate (where applicable) is for illustrative purposes only, and is not a prediction, projection or forecast of the future performance of the investment. There is no guarantee that the indicative return and/or distribution rate (where applicable) will be achieved. The value of investments and investment returns (including dividends, distributions, income or other returns) may rise or fall.
4) You are fully aware of the risks involved in the investment, including the risks set out in the Invest Account Terms, and you undertake all investments and investment transactions at your sole risk.
5) You will be responsible for your own investment decisions. GXS Bank does not offer investment advice of any nature, and any information which we provide is not offered as investment advice or recommendations. Any such information which we provide is intended for general circulation and does not take into account the specific investment objectives, financial situation or particular needs of any particular person. You should not place any reliance on us as giving you any advice or making any recommendations. Where necessary, you should seek your own independent financial, professional or other advice.
6) Unless we inform you otherwise, we are acting as your agent in the investment transaction.
This advertisement or publication has not been reviewed by the Monetary Authority of Singapore

Title: How long do I need to hold the funds for in my GXS Biz Account? - GXS Help Centre

Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:16:07.859780
Word Count: 73
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

To qualify for the reward under this campaign, you will need to hold the funds for at least 60 days in your GXS Biz Account from and including the date of depositing funds. Funds must be deposited between 11 November and 31 December 2025.
For example, if you deposit your funds on 15 December 2025, you will need to hold the funds until 13 February 2026 in order to qualify for the reward.

Title: What are fresh funds and how is it calculated? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/Pocket_is_Right_campaign/What_are_fresh_funds_and_how_is_it_calculated%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:16:10.880873
Word Count: 66
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Fresh funds means funds not transferred or withdrawn from any existing GXS Savings Account (i.e. not transferred from a Main Account, any Saving Pocket, or any Boost Pocket), and re-deposited into your GXS Savings Account.
For this Campaign, fresh funds will be the incremental amount of balances in your GXS Savings Account over the total balances in your GXS Savings Account as of 31 March 2025.

================================================================================

Title: What are the available crediting methods when I wish to sell my investments? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/GXS_Invest_Orders/What_are_the_available_crediting_methods_when_I_wish_to_sell_my_investments%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:16:36.382169
Word Count: 141
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Currently, you can only receive the redemption proceeds into the Main Account of your GXS Savings Account. Simply follow these steps:
1. Log in to the GXS Bank app and proceed to the GXS Invest home screen.
2. On the â€˜Sell Orderâ€™ page, select GXS Savings Account Main Account as your crediting method.
3. Key in a Sell amount. Do ensure the amount does not exceed your â€˜Available Amountâ€™*.
4. Review your order details in the order summary page.
5. Acknowledge that you have read the Invest Account Terms, Fund Documents as well as Risk Disclosures.
6. Tap on â€˜Sellâ€™ to proceed with the redemption.
*Available amount is the amount you can redeem, excluding any pending Sell order(s). If you have recently made any Buy order(s), that amount can only be redeemed after 2 business days from the day of purchase.

Title: My company has foreign directors and/or shareholders. Can the company still be onboarded? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/Open_a_GXS_Biz_Account/My_company_has_foreign_directors_and%2F%2For_shareholders._Can_the_company_still_be_onboarded%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:16:39.254528
Word Count: 63
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

We are unable to onboard if all directors and major shareholders in your company are foreign nationals without Singapore PR status.
To be eligible, your company must meet these two requirements:
Directors:
At least two directors must be a Singapore Citizen or Singapore Permanent Resident.
Shareholders:
All major shareholders (holding 25% or more of shares) must be a Singapore Citizen or Singapore PR.

Title: Why was my Buy order reversed? - GXS Help Centre

Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:16:59.344732

Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Please ensure that your total balance (including any refunds and interest accruals) does not exceed the maximum balance amount that you can hold in your GXS Savings Account.
View the status of your Buy order by tapping â€˜Transactionsâ€™ on the GXS Invest home screen and selecting the relevant Buy order.

Title: My Sell order has been completed but the monies have not yet been credited to my account. Why is this so? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/GXS_Invest_Orders/My_Sell_order_has_been_completed_but_the_monies_have_not_yet_been_credited_to_my_account._Why_is_this_so%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:17:05.158670
Word Count: 134
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

We were unable to credit the monies to your GXS Savings Account, if doing so would cause the available balance in your GXS Savings Account to exceed the prevailing maximum balance amount. To receive your redemption proceeds, you will need to reduce the balance in your GXS Savings Account first.
Follow these simple steps to find out the maximum balance amount for your GXS Savings Account:
1. Log in to the GXS Bank app.
2. Tap on the 3 dots next to your â€˜GXS SAVINGS ACCOUNT'.
3. Tap on â€˜View balance infoâ€™.
For further enquiries, you can reach out to our Customer Service team:
- GXS Bank app, Help Centre: GXS Chat (Recommended)
- GXS Bank app, Help Centre: Contact Us form
- GXS Hotline: Â 1800 866 6685Â or (+65) 6866 6685 (from overseas)

Title: When will I receive my referral cashback reward and where will it be credited? - GXS Help Centre

Word Count: 105
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

If you only hold a GXS FlexiLoan account, you will need to open a GXS Savings Account by 30 June 2025 in order to receive your cashback reward.
Cashback rewards will be credited in the following manner:
For Referrers and Referees who are both GXS Savings Account and GXS FlexiLoan customers, cashback reward will be credited into the Main Account of your GXS Savings Account on or before 31 July 2025; and
For Referrers and Referees who are GXS FlexiCard customers and do not maintain a GXS Savings Account, cashback reward will be credited into your GXS FlexiCard account on or before 31 July 2025.

Title: How do I request an audit confirmation? - GXS Help Centre

Word Count: 99
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

You can request an audit confirmation "Submit an enquiry" via the Help Centre on the GXS Bank app. Only the authorised person can make this request.
To submit your request, provide:
Date for the audit confirmation.
Name and email address of your auditor.
(Optional) Auditorâ€™s reference number.
Once processed, the confirmation report will be emailed to you. The report is password-protected, so ensure you share the password with your auditor.
Requests might be rejected if it is not from the authorised user, or if duplicate requests are made for the same period. If thereâ€™s a problem, youâ€™ll be notified.

================================================================================

View account details of linked GXS Savings Account.
Send money directly from your linked GXS Savings Account.
Top up Dash wallet from GXS Savings Account.
Make QR payments directly from your linked GXS Savings Account.

Title: Can I fund my GXS Savings Account using my GrabPay Wallet? - GXS Help Centre

Word Count: 91
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Yes, you can!
To move funds from your GrabPay Wallet to your GXS account, you can use the 'Transfer'Â function in the Grab app inÂ two ways:
If you've set up your GXS Savings Account as your PayNow account via Phone Number,Â it will be available to select under 'Transfer to your PayNow account'.
You can also send money via your account number by pressing 'Bank account' under Transfer to a different account and adding a recipient with GXS Bank as the Bank name and your account number (starting with 888).

Title: Is there a daily transaction limit for performing My Singtel transactions using funds from my GXS Savings Account? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Grab_and_Singtel_Experiences/My_Singtel_App/Is_there_a_daily_transaction_limit_for_performing_My_Singtel_transactions_using_funds_from_my_GXS_Savings_Account%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:17:42.556145
Word Count: 46
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Yes, there is a daily transaction limit for all payments made on My Singtel App using your GXS Savings Account. The default daily transaction limit is set at S$500, but you can increase this limit to up to S$1,000 per day through your GXS Bank app.

Title: Who is eligible to open a GXS Invest account? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/Opening_a_GXS_Invest_Account/Who_is_eligible_to_open_a_GXS_Invest_account%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:17:48.286675
Word Count: 135
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

You can open a GXS Invest account if:
You are a Singapore Citizen, Permanent Resident, or foreigner with a valid pass
You have a Singpass Myinfo account
You are at least 18 years old
You are residing in Singapore
You open or hold a GXS Savings Account
Due to restrictions stated in the fund(s) prospectus, we are unable to offer our investment products to US citizens, including US Permanent Residents and Green Card Holders.
To open a GXS Invest account, your personal information on Singpass Myinfo has to be accurate and up-to-date. Do ensure that Singpass Myinfo has your latest updated details such as your residential address, email, and phone number. If you need any help updating your information or accessing your Singpass account, you can reach out to the Singpass Helpdesk for further assistance.

================================================================================

Title: How is my GXS account(s) protected? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Keeping_Your_Data_and_Device_Secure/How_is_my_GXS_account(s)_protected%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:17:54.171742
Word Count: 164
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Your data and account security are our utmost priority. To protect your account and information, we've set up a multi-layered defence against fraud.
We employ secure technology and protocols to keep your information and money safe. For example, only one device can access your GXS account at any time. Logging in to your GXS account on a new device will automatically deregister your old device.
We've established a dedicated anti-fraud team to monitor and review fraud alerts, and for intervention work.
We screen all transactions with our advanced monitoring and surveillance systems to detect unusual activities on our customers' accounts. This helps us prevent or interveneÂ potential unauthorised transactions.
Apart from these measures, it's crucial to stay vigilant against fraud and scams. If you have questions or concerns, feel free to reach us at:
GXS app, Help Centre: GXS Chat (Recommended)
GXS app, Help Centre: Submit an enquiry
GXS Hotline: 1800 866 6685 or (+65) 6866 6685 (from overseas)
GXS Customer Support Email:
help@gxs.com.sg

================================================================================

Title: Whatâ€™s great about linking my GXS Savings Account to my Grab app? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Grab_and_Singtel_Experiences/GXS_on_Grab_Rewards/What%E2%80%99s_great_about_linking_my_GXS_Savings_Account_to_my_Grab_app%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:17:17.674544

Title: How do I link and pay with my GXS Savings Account on my Grab app? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Grab_and_Singtel_Experiences/GXS_on_Grab/How_do_I_link_and_pay_with_my_GXS_Savings_Account_on_my_Grab_app%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:17:57.106239
Word Count: 139
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Hereâ€™s how you can link your GXS Savings Account to your Grab app:
From your Grab app home screen, tap on the 'Finance' tab.
Select 'Activate GXS Savings Account'.
Follow the on-screen instructions to link your GXS Savings Account.
Once done, you will be able to use your GXS Savings Account as a payment method for Grab Transport, Food, Mart or Express in the Grab app and earn 1.2X GrabRewards points each time! For even greater convenience, you may want to set your GXS Savings Account as the primary payment method.
Do note that a 12-hour freeze for high risk transactions will be imposed upon linking your GXS Savings Account to Grab. During this period, you will not be able to transfer large amounts of cash or increase your daily transfer limit on your Grab and GXS Bank app.

================================================================================

Title: Where can I find my GXS FlexiLoan Biz interest rates? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz/GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz_-_Interest_and_Fees/Where_can_I_find_my_GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz_interest_rates%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:18:21.270764
Word Count: 118
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Your interest rate (APR and EIR) will be shared with you upon successful application along with your assigned credit limit, so that you have all the details you need to make an informed decision on whether you wish to take up on the offer.
You may also find your interest rate within the GXS Bank app home screen right beneath your GXS FlexiLoan Biz credit limit.
*The Annual Percentage Rate (APR) represents the total borrowing cost, expressed as a yearly rate, relative to the initial loan amount.
The Effective Interest Rate (EIR) is the rate that reflects the true cost of borrowing and takes into account total charges. It's computed over a reducing balance basis and accrued daily.

================================================================================

Title: For Dash transactions paid with GXS Savings Account on my Dash app that require a refund, will the money be refunded to the GXS Savings Account? - GXS Help Centre

No. If your linked GXS Savings Account is used as the payment method on the Dash app for a transaction that is to be given a refund, the refund will be sent to your Dash Wallet.

Title: How do I top up my GrabPay Wallet with my GXS Savings Account? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Grab_and_Singtel_Experiences/GXS_on_Grab/How_do_I_top_up_my_GrabPay_Wallet_with_my_GXS_Savings_Account%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:17:47.096545
Word Count: 142
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

We're working on making top-ups to your GrabPay Wallet easy peasy. Here's how you can top up your GrabPay Wallet with your GXS Savings Account:
First, get the VPA link from Grab app. Here's how:
From your Grab app home screen, tap on your GrabPay Wallet balance.
Tap on 'Top Up'.
From the Top Up menu, tap on 'Banking app'Â > PayNow VPAÂ (If you are doing this for the first time, you should receive a prompt about linking your VPA. Tap on Next > Link VPA).
Select 'PayNow VPA'.
Select 'Other Banks'.
Copy VPA.
Next, send money from your GXS Bank app using the VPA link:
On your GXS Bank app home screen, tap on 'Send Money'.
Select 'VPA'.
Paste the copied VPA in the top bar.
Enter your top-up amount and send.
Top up to your GrabPay Wallet is done!

Title: What is GXS Invest? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/GXS_Invest_Features/What_is_GXS_Invest%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:18:36.719186
Word Count: 144
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

GXS Invest is a product by GXS Bank that provides access to investment product(s), including the Fullerton SGD Cash Fund - Class G ("Fullerton SGD Cash Fund").
Fullerton SGD Cash Fund is actively managed by Fullerton Fund Management, a Temasek Holdings and Income Insurance backed asset management company. The Fund seeks to provide investors with liquidity while achieving a return that is comparable to the SGD Bank Saving Deposits rate by investing primarily into Singapore Dollar-denominated deposits as well as Singapore government related bills.
Eligible customers invested in Fullerton SGD Cash Fund purchased through GXS Bank will also receive a complimentary group personal accident insurance coverage of up to 3 times the investment amount, subject to a maximum of S$100,000, underwritten by Singapore Life Ltd ("Singlife").
For more information on the Group Personal Accident insurance coverage, refer to the FAQ section on â€˜Singlife Insuranceâ€™.

Title: How do I link and pay with my GXS Savings Account on my Grab app? - GXS Help Centre

Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Hereâ€™s how you can link your GXS Savings Account to your Grab app:
From your Grab app home screen, tap on the 'Finance' tab.
Select 'Activate GXS Savings Account'.
Follow the on-screen instructions to link your GXS Savings Account.
Once done, you will be able to use your GXS Savings Account as a payment method for Grab Transport, Food, Mart or Express in the Grab app and earn 1.2X GrabRewards points each time! For even greater convenience, you may want to set your GXS Savings Account as the primary payment method.
Do note that a 12-hour freeze for high risk transactions will be imposed upon linking your GXS Savings Account to Grab. During this period, you will not be able to transfer large amounts of cash or increase your daily transfer limit on your Grab and GXS Bank app.

Title: What's the difference between the daily transfer limit on the GXS app, and the daily transaction limit for my linked GXS Savings Account on the Grab app? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Grab_and_Singtel_Experiences/GXS_on_Grab/What's_the_difference_between_the_daily_transfer_limit_on_the_GXS_app%2C_and_the_daily_transaction_limit_for_my_linked_GXS_Savings_Account_on_the_Grab_app%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:18:04.688597
Word Count: 83
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Daily transfer limit on GXS Bank app:
This refers to the daily amount you can transfer from your GXS Savings Account to other bank accounts, through the various modes of transfer (e.g. PayNow, local bank transfers).
Daily transaction limit for linked GXS Savings Account on Grab app:
This refers to the total daily transactions you can make from your GXS Savings Account on Grab app, including top ups to your GrabPay Wallet.
Please note that the transfer and transaction limits are not related.

Title: What are the benefits of using Singpass Face Verification? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Using_the_App/What_are_the_benefits_of_using_Singpass_Face_Verification%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:18:54.969456
Word Count: 122
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

There are several key benefits to using Singpass Face Verification, each contributing to a more secure and convenient user experience:
Security
: It provides a high level of security by ensuring that the person attempting to access the service is the legitimate user.
Convenience
: Users can authenticate their identity quickly and easily without needing to remember passwords or carry physical identification documents.
Integration
: It is seamlessly integrated with various services that require identity verification, making it a versatile tool for both personal and business use.
Overall, Singpass Face Verification offers a robust, secure, and user-friendly method for identity authentication, enhancing the digital experience for GXS Bank users.
For more information on Singpass Face Verification, you can refer to
Singpass Helpdesk.

1. Manual repayments: You can manually initiate repayments from your GXS Biz Account at any time before or on the repayment due date.

The promotional rate of 4.99%p.a. will then be applied to your GXS Flexiloan Biz permanently.

Title: I have recently submitted a Buy order. Why can't I sell my investments? - GXS Help Centre

Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Title: How is daily interest calculated for GXS Biz Account? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/GXS_Biz_Account_Interest_and_Fees/How_is_daily_interest_calculated_for_GXS_Biz_Account%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:19:28.820368
Word Count: 158
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

You earn interest daily based on the balance of your GXS Biz Account at the end of each day. Interest earned on the account balance is 1.08% per annum.
We multiply your balance by the interest rate per annum over 365 days. Interest will be credited to your account when you earn at least S$0.01 in accumulated interest.
For example, based on an interest rate of 1.08% per annum applicable on balances in your GXS Biz Account:
On 2Â AugustÂ 2025, your balance in your GXS Biz Account is S$40,000. You will earn an accrued interest of S$1.18356.
S$1.18Â will be credited to your account on 3 AugustÂ 2025Â morning. Your balance will now be S$40,001.18. The remaining S$0.00356Â will continue to accrue the next day
Terms and conditions apply. For full GXS Business Banking Terms and Conditions, visit:
Business Account Terms
here
.
Biz Ecosystem Terms - Grab
here
.
Biz Ecosystem Terms - Singtel
here
.

================================================================================

Title: Can I delete a scheduled transfer? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/GXS_Biz_Account_Payments/Can_I_delete_a_scheduled_transfer%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:19:35.205590
Word Count: 63
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Absolutely! You can easily remove a scheduled transfer in the GXS Bank app. Here's how:
1. Tap on "Send Money" on the top bar.
2. In the Scheduled Transfers section, tap the ellipsis button next to the scheduled transfer you want to delete.
3. Choose "Remove scheduled transfer."
4. Confirm by tapping "Remove."
Your scheduled transfer will then be removed from the list.

Title: How does GXS Bank use my personal data? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Your_Data_Privacy/How_does_GXS_Bank_use_my_personal_data%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:20:00.716943
Word Count: 72
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

We use your data to:
Confirm your identity.
Respond to queries and feedback.
Enhance our products and services.
Execute our day-to-day business and administrative operations.
Comply with laws and legal obligations, and our GXS Bank policies.
Perform checks so as to prevent and detect crime, and for risk management purposes.
Note that this is a non-exhaustive list. For more details, please refer to our full Data Protection Policy on GXS Bank website.
