Title: How do I report an alleged fraud attempt or scam? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/Keeping_your_GXS_Biz_Account_Payments_and_Money_Secure/How_do_I_report_an_alleged_fraud_attempt_or_scam%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:20:12.833698
Word Count: 336
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Weâ€™re here for you every step of the way. Contact us immediately so that we can suspend your GXS Bank account(s) and take you through the fraud reporting process. Next, lodge an online police report at the Singapore Police Force (SPF) website or visit your nearest police station. Reach us at:
GXS Bank app, Help Centre: GXS Chat
GXS Hotline: 1800 866 6685 or (+65) 6866 6685 (from overseas).
Hereâ€™s an overview of the reporting process so you know what to expect. There are two steps to take when thereâ€™s a suspected fraud or scam:
Suspend your account
You can suspend your account immediately through our voice automated system or speak to one of our agents via call or Live Chat. After your account has been suspended, our agent will ask you for details such as the date and time of the incident. To suspend your account via our voice automated system,
1. Call us at GXS Hotline: 1800 866 6685 or (+65) 6866 6685 (from overseas).
2. Press 1 and verify your NRIC and date of birth. Your account will be suspended immediately.
Lodge a police report
To file a police report, you can either:
File it online: The SPF has an e-services portal where you can file certain types of reports online. Just go to their website and look for the "e-Report" section.
Call the SPF Hotline: For urgent matters that need immediate police attention, you can SMS 70999 or call '999'. For non-urgent matters, you can call '1800-255-0000'. They will advise you on the next steps, which might include filing a report in person.
Visit a police station: Head to your nearest Neighbourhood Police Centre (NPC) or Police Divisional Headquarters. The officers there will assist you with taking your report.
You may not have lost money, but this is important if youâ€™ve given your personal information to anyone claiming to be from GXS Bank via call, links, or email. Our agent will follow up with an email to request for the police report.

Title: What are confirmation notes and how do I retrieve them? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/GXS_Invest_Documentation/What_are_confirmation_notes_and_how_do_I_retrieve_them%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:20:18.948602
Word Count: 117
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Confirmation notes serve to provide you with the details of your Buy or Sell transactions (including the trade date, executed unit price as well as the number of units) once the orders have been completed.
Here's how you can view your confirmation notes:
1. Log in to the GXS Bank app.
2. Proceed to the GXS Invest home screen.
3. Tap on the specific transaction.
4. Scroll to the bottom of the screen and tap on 'Order Confirmation Note'.
Confirmation notes will be made available through the GXS Bank app no later than 1 business day after each successful completion of an order. You will receive an email and/or push notification once your confirmation note is ready.

================================================================================

help@gxs.com.sg

Types of personal data to be corrected and the correction(s) to be made.
Supporting document(s) for the requested correction(s).

Title: When will I receive my referral cashback reward and where will it be credited? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/'Refer_a_Friend'_campaign/When_will_I_receive_my_referral_cashback_reward_and_where_will_it_be_credited%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:20:24.734359
Word Count: 105
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

If you only hold a GXS FlexiLoan account, you will need to open a GXS Savings Account by 30 June 2025 in order to receive your cashback reward.
Cashback rewards will be credited in the following manner:
For Referrers and Referees who are both GXS Savings Account and GXS FlexiLoan customers, cashback reward will be credited into the Main Account of your GXS Savings Account on or before 31 July 2025; and
For Referrers and Referees who are GXS FlexiCard customers and do not maintain a GXS Savings Account, cashback reward will be credited into your GXS FlexiCard account on or before 31 July 2025.

Title: What happens if my GXS FlexiLoan Biz repayment due date falls on a Public Holiday? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz/GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz_Repayment/What_happens_if_my_GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz_repayment_due_date_falls_on_a_Public_Holiday%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:20:43.053473
Word Count: 44
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Not to worry! Repayment dates are not affected by public holidays and will remain the same date you initially chose.
However, if the day does not exist within the month, then your due date will be defaulted to the last day of the month.

Title: How do I top up my GrabPay Wallet with my GXS Savings Account? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Grab_and_Singtel_Experiences/GXS_on_Grab/How_do_I_top_up_my_GrabPay_Wallet_with_my_GXS_Savings_Account%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:20:52.507084
Word Count: 142
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

We're working on making top-ups to your GrabPay Wallet easy peasy. Here's how you can top up your GrabPay Wallet with your GXS Savings Account:
First, get the VPA link from Grab app. Here's how:
From your Grab app home screen, tap on your GrabPay Wallet balance.
Tap on 'Top Up'.
From the Top Up menu, tap on 'Banking app'Â > PayNow VPAÂ (If you are doing this for the first time, you should receive a prompt about linking your VPA. Tap on Next > Link VPA).
Select 'PayNow VPA'.
Select 'Other Banks'.
Copy VPA.
Next, send money from your GXS Bank app using the VPA link:
On your GXS Bank app home screen, tap on 'Send Money'.
Select 'VPA'.
Paste the copied VPA in the top bar.
Enter your top-up amount and send.
Top up to your GrabPay Wallet is done!

================================================================================

Title: How do I file an insurance claim under the Group Personal Accident coverage? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/Complimentary_SingLife_Insurance/How_do_I_file_an_insurance_claim_under_the_Group_Personal_Accident_coverage%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:20:59.103837
Word Count: 348
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Please be informed that Singlife must be given written notice of any claims for accidental injury within 30 days of the date of the accident. Any written notice given by or on behalf of you (as the Insured Member) containing sufficient particulars for Singlife to identify you is considered sufficient notice. Â If the notice is not given to Singlife within the requisite time (within 30 days of the date of the accident), Singlife may Â accept submission of a claim if it can be shown that it was not reasonably possible to give such notice and that notice was given to Singlife as soon as it was reasonably possible.
If you have a GXS Invest account and would like to file an insurance claim, do follow these steps:
Step 1: Submit all claims forms and supporting documents to
managed_care3@singlife.com
within the 30 days of the date of the accident. The relevant claim forms can be downloaded from
https://singlife.com/en/claims/emplo...surance-claims
Singlife will require any or all of the following:
1) Certificates, medical reports, information and evidence in such form and nature as Singlife may prescribe;
2) Evidence to establish the continuing health condition of the Insured Member;
3) That the Insured Member be available for examination by Singlifeâ€™s approved Registered Medical Practitioner when required and if the Insured Member is residing outside Singapore, Singlife may still require him to come to Singapore for such medical examination;
4) Proof of the Insured Memberâ€™s date of birth
For processing of a claim for death as a result of Accidental Injury, Singlife has Â the right to require an autopsy to be performed provided that such autopsy is not forbidden by law.
Kindly note this will be at your own cost.
Step 2: Â Singlife will validate with GXS Bank whether you held any investments with GXS Bank on the date of the accident.
Step 3: Once Singlife has assessed and confirmed your eligibility and approved your claim, the benefits will be paid directly to you (or your legal representative) via a cheque by Singlife.
For more details, please refer to the 'Singlife Insurance Product Summary'

Title: I see 2 sections under the â€˜Send Moneyâ€™ screen. What is â€˜Recentâ€™ and what is â€˜Favouriteâ€™? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/GXS_Biz_Account_Payments/I_see_2_sections_under_the_%E2%80%98Send_Money%E2%80%99_screen._What_is_%E2%80%98Recent%E2%80%99_and_what_is_%E2%80%98Favourite%E2%80%99%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:21:29.658839
Word Count: 100
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

The 'Recent' tab shows all the recipients you recently transferred funds to. This includes transfers performed via FAST, PayNow and Scan and Pay. Your recent recipients are shown in chronological order, with the most recent transfer listed at the top.
To add a recent recipient as 'Favourite', simply select a recipient from the 'Recent' tab. Then tap on the star icon, type in a preferred name for the recipient and save as Favourite. This recipient will now be shown in the 'Favourite' tab.
You can now initiate a fund transfer to a 'Recent' or 'Favourite' recipient with a single tap!

================================================================================

Title: How can I use the Recent and/or Favourite recipient tabs? - GXS Help Centre

Transfers are now just a tap away!

Title: Why do my available units for redemption differ from my current value? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/GXS_Invest_Orders/Why_do_my_available_units_for_redemption_differ_from_my_current_value%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:21:38.722209
Word Count: 44
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

The units eligible for redemption do not include those associated with any existing pending Sell orders.
Additionally, if you have recently placed a Buy order, the corresponding amount can only be redeemed after a waiting period of 2 business days from the trade date.

Title: Can I repay more than my GXS FlexiLoan Biz monthly repayment amount? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz/GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz_Repayment/Can_I_repay_more_than_my_GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz_monthly_repayment_amount%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:21:41.701790
Word Count: 34
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Yes, you may repay more than the monthly repayment amount stipulated without incurring fees. The excess amount will be deducted from your next monthly repayment amount due, or applied to your other active loan(s).

Title: Can a company with a single director open a GXS Biz Account? - GXS Help Centre

Title: Am I able to apply for a GXS Biz Account from my Grab Merchant app? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/?title=GXS_Biz_Account/Grab_%26_Singtel_Experiences/Am_I_able_to_apply_for_a_GXS_Biz_Account_from_my_Grab_Merchant_app%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:22:19.506386
Word Count: 277
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Currently, GXS Biz Accounts can only be applied for via the GXS Bank app.
To apply for a GXS Biz Account:
Download the GXS Bank app from the App Store or Play Store.
Launch the app and tap on 'GXS Biz Account - Sign up now'.
Follow the on-screen instructions.
You'll need to:
Be at least 18 years old.
Have a residential address in Singapore.
Be a Singapore citizen or Singapore Permanent Resident.
Have a Singpass Myinfo account.
Have an active ACRA registration account.
Not currently hold, and never have held, a GXS Savings Account, GXS FlexiLoan account, or GXS FlexiCard.
Not currently hold, and never have held, a GXS Biz Account or a GXS FlexiLoan Biz account.
Note - we currently do not accept applications from US citizens or residents. If we require additional documents, we will email you or send you a notification on the GXS Bank app.
Your GXS Biz Account will be opened shortly after your documents have been reviewed and approved. We would like to share that your deposits with GXS Bank are aggregated and insured up to S$100,000 by the Singapore Deposit Insurance Corporation (SDIC).
If you require assistance on your Singpass access, you may contact Singpass Helpdesk directly.
Switching your Grab Merchant settlement account to GXS Biz Account:
Once your GXS Biz Account is opened, log in to your Grab Merchant profile.
On the home page, tap on the 'GXS Banking' tile.
Select 'Switch to GXS Biz Account' and follow the instructions.
Please note that it may take around 3 business days for the GXS Biz Account to show up on your Grab Merchant app as your Grab settlement account.

================================================================================

Title: How do I remove a Favourite recipient from my GXS Biz Account? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/GXS_Biz_Account_Payments/How_do_I_remove_a_Favourite_recipient_from_my_GXS_Biz_Account%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:22:25.675769
Word Count: 119
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Removing a Favourite from your Favourite list:
To remove a Favourite recipient, open your GXS Bank app. Tap on "Send Money" and swipe left on your recipient tile. Select the remove icon and confirm your removal.
Removing a Favourite from your recent recipient list:
To remove a Favourite recipient, open your GXS Bank app. Tap on "Send Money" and "â­" on the recipient tile. Then, confirm your removal.
Once your Favourite recipient removal is successful, the recipient will be removed from your Favourite list. Do note that you will not be able to remove your Favourite recipient immediately after transacting with them. Head to the Favourites tab and slide over the recipient's tile to remove them from the list.

Title: What can I do to protect my mobile device? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Keeping_Your_Data_and_Device_Secure/What_can_I_do_to_protect_my_mobile_device%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:22:38.218243
Word Count: 97
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Here are 3 ways you can protect your mobile device:
Set up automatic updates for your device's applications and operating systems. This is to ensure you have the newest security patches and bug fixes to secure your device and data
Download apps only from the official Google Play Store or the Apple App Store. Be sure to read the reviews and ratings too. Unverified or unsupported apps can be carriers of security vulnerabilities.
Lastly, do not set passwords that are easy to guess or are related to your personal details, such as your birthday or NRIC number.

Title: I opened a GXS Bank account as a FIN holder but Iâ€™m a Permanent Resident now. Do I need to update my new NRIC number with GXS Bank? - GXS Help Centre

Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:22:56.249215
Word Count: 136
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Firstly, congrats on becoming a Permanent Resident in Singapore!
Yes, you do need to update your new NRIC number with us. Your personal details on GXS must match your information on Singpass Myinfo. You will not be able to log in to the GXS Bank app on a new device if you have not updated us with your personal information (e.g. if you have a new NRIC number but registered with your old FIN number with GXS).
If you run into issues during new device registration because of a mismatch in personal details, fret not! We can process this change for you. Simply contact us at:
GXS Hotline: 1800 866 6685 or (+65) 6866 6685 (from overseas)
GXS Customer Support Email:
help@gxs.com.sg
You will need to email us copies of your old and new identification documents.

Title: What is the level of coverage provided under the Group Personal Accident coverage? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/Complimentary_SingLife_Insurance/What_is_the_level_of_coverage_provided_under_the_Group_Personal_Accident_coverage%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:23:13.111229
Word Count: 69
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

You will be covered for a sum assured of up to three times the value of your investment value in the Fullerton SGD Cash Fund (Share Class G) on the date of accident, subject to a maximum of S$100,000.
Should you be 64 years old and above at the time of accident, your sum assured shall be reduced to 50% of benefits payable, subject to a maximum of S$50,000.

Title: How do I open an account for GXS Invest? - GXS Help Centre

Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

To open a GXS Invest account, you first need an existing GXS Savings Account. If you need help opening one, refer to our detailed guide
here
.
If you're already an existing GXS Savings Account customer, simply follow these steps to open a GXS Invest account:
1. Log in to your GXS Bank app.
2. Tap on 'GXS Invest'.
3. Tap on 'Create Account'.
4. Follow the guided instructions to create a GXS Invest account with Singpass Myinfo.
At the moment, you cannot open a GXS Invest account unless you hold a GXS Savings Account (even if you have any other GXS products/accounts). However, GXS Bank is exploring options to make GXS Invest available to these customers in the near future. Keep an eye out for updates from GXS Bank regarding this!

Title: How do I apply for a GXS Biz Account? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/Open_a_GXS_Biz_Account/How_do_I_apply_for_a_GXS_Biz_Account%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:23:25.127216
Word Count: 212
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Thank you for your support!
The GXS Biz Account is currently available for sole proprietors and Private Limited companies.
To apply, simply download the GXS Bank app through the iOS App Store or Google Play Store. Launch the app and select 'Business banking'. After which, tap on 'Sign up' and we will guide you the rest of the way.
You'll need to:
Be at least 18 years old.
Have a residential address in Singapore.
Be a Singapore citizen or Singapore Permanent Resident.
Have a Singpass Myinfo account.
Have an active ACRA registration account.
Not currently hold, and never have held, a GXS Savings Account, GXS FlexiLoan Account, or GXS FlexiCard.
Not currently hold, and never have held, a GXS Biz Account or a GXS FlexiLoan Biz.
Do note: We currently do not accept applications from US citizens or residents. If we require additional documents, we will email or send you a notification on the GXS Bank app. Your GXS Biz Account will be opened shortly after your documents have been reviewed and approved.
We would like to share that your deposits with GXS Bank are aggregated and insured up to S$100,000 by the Singapore Deposit Insurance Corporation (SDIC).
If you require assistance on your Singpass access, you may contact
Singpass Helpdesk
directly.

Title: Can I make multiple deposits to reach the S$100,000 requirement? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/GXS_Biz_Account_2025_Year-End_Promotion/Can_I_make_multiple_deposits_to_reach_the_S%24100%2C000_requirement%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:23:37.380276
Word Count: 45
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Yes. For new customers, your 60-day period will begin on the day your total account balance first meets or exceeds S$100,000. For existing customers, your 60-day period will begin on the day you deposit a total of S$100,000 in fresh funds within the campaign period.

Title: What's the difference between the daily transfer limit on the GXS app, and the daily transaction limit for my linked GXS Savings Account on the Grab app? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Grab_and_Singtel_Experiences/GXS_on_Grab/What's_the_difference_between_the_daily_transfer_limit_on_the_GXS_app%2C_and_the_daily_transaction_limit_for_my_linked_GXS_Savings_Account_on_the_Grab_app%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:23:40.315538
Word Count: 83
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Daily transfer limit on GXS Bank app:
This refers to the daily amount you can transfer from your GXS Savings Account to other bank accounts, through the various modes of transfer (e.g. PayNow, local bank transfers).
Daily transaction limit for linked GXS Savings Account on Grab app:
This refers to the total daily transactions you can make from your GXS Savings Account on Grab app, including top ups to your GrabPay Wallet.
Please note that the transfer and transaction limits are not related.

================================================================================

Title: What are considered fresh funds? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz/Chinese_New_Year_2025_Campaign/What_are_considered_fresh_funds%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:23:49.429889
Word Count: 57
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

For the GXS Business Banking CNY2025 Cashback Campaign, fresh funds refer to new funds deposited into your GXS Biz Account between 20 January and 28 February 2025.
The funds should be newly deposited and not transferred from any existing GXS Bank account, including GXS FlexiLoan Biz.
For the full promotion Terms and Conditions, do refer
here
.

Title: When can I place an order and when will it be processed? - GXS Help Centre

Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:23:55.808282
Word Count: 84
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

You can place a Buy or Sell order on the GXS Bank app at a time of your convenience.
Orders placed before 3:30PM on a business day will be processed on the same day.
Orders placed after 3:30PM on a business day or orders received on a non-business day will be processed the next business day.
You can view the order status and estimated order completion date by tapping 'Transactions' on the GXS Invest home screen and selecting the relevant Buy or Sell order.

Title: What are the conditions to earn cash credit under the GXS Business Banking CNY2025 Cashback Campaign? - GXS Help Centre

Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:24:01.745307

================================================================================

The GXS Business Banking CNY2025 Cashback Campaign is open to all new and existing sole proprietors to GXS Business Banking.
Simply open or hold a GXS Biz Account and deposit fresh funds of minimum S$10,000 by 28 February 2025, and ensure a day end balance of at least S$10,000 on 31 May 2025.
You will earn a S$88 cashback reward, which will be deposited to your GXS Biz Account by 30 June 2025.
OR
You can open or hold a GXS FlexiLoan Biz account and take a loan by 28 February 2025. Here are the different cashback rewards you can earn:
Important thing to note! You will need to maintain more than 50% of your loan amount three months from the date you first took the loan.
The cashback reward will be credited to your GXS Biz Account by 30 June 2025!
Conditions
Do note that each customer will be eligible for one cashback reward only (of the higherÂ value). And the cash reward is limited to the first 500 eligible customers.
Example
On 25 February 2025, you deposit fresh funds of S$15,000 into your GXS Biz Account and maintain the funds until 31 May 2025.
On the same day, you also borrow a loan for S$20,000 and maintain 50% of the loan till 25 May 2025.
You will be eligible to earn 1 reward - S$388 (higher reward value)

here
.

Title: How do I reset my GXS Bank app passcode? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Using_the_App/How_do_I_reset_my_GXS_Bank_app_passcode%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:24:10.605690
Word Count: 150
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

If you've forgotten your passcode,
There are 2 ways to reset your passcode on the GXS Bank app:
On your current device:
1. On the login screen, tap 'Forgot Passcode?'
2. You will be prompted to verify your identity on Singpass before you can reset your passcode.
3. After logging into GXS, you will then be required to create a new GXS passcode.
On a new device:
Verify your identity via Singpass. An OTP will be sent to your registered email address.
Tap 'Forgot Passcode?'
Key in the OTP that is sent to your registered mobile number and you can reset your passcode.
If you'd just like to change your passcode,
Tap 'Me'.
Select 'Change Passcode' under 'Settings'.
You will need to key in your current passcode before you can update to a new one.
If you are encountering issues with your Singpass login, do have a read
here
.

Title: How is the annual management fee charged and reflected in the Unit Price of the Fullerton SGD Cash Fund? - GXS Help Centre

Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:24:28.148000
Word Count: 58
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

The annual management fee is already factored into the Fundâ€™s Unit Price on every dealing day, and no further deductions are made when fund units are bought or sold.
For example, If the unit price on a given day is S$1.2008, the redemption proceeds you will receive from selling 1,000 units is exactly S$1,200.80 without any other charges.

.

Title: How can I safeguard my data? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Keeping_Your_Data_and_Device_Secure/How_can_I_safeguard_my_data%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:25:07.697046
Word Count: 107
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Scammers adapt their tactics to different victims, so it's important to remain vigilant. Here are some tips to help you avoid online banking scams:
Do not click on links in unsolicited SMSes or emails.
Call us at 1800 866 6685 or (+65) 6866 6685 (from overseas) to verify unsolicited SMSes or emails.
Never ever share your banking details or passwords with anyone.
Secure your device with a strong password to prevent unauthorised access.
Turn on your mobile notifications to be alerted on any account activities. You should also check your transaction records regularly so that any unauthorised transactions can be prevented or reported as soon as possible.

Title: What is the Fullerton SGD Cash Fund - Class G and how does it differ from the other classes of the same fund? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/GXS_Invest_Features/What_is_the_Fullerton_SGD_Cash_Fund_-_Class_G_and_how_does_it_differ_from_the_other_classes_of_the_same_fund%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:25:22.942015
Word Count: 110
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Unit trusts often offer several share classes to investors. Each class invests in the exact same portfolio of securities and has the same investment objectives. However, features such as launch dates and distribution channels can differ.
Class G is available for subscription exclusively through GXS Bank (with the additional feature of complimentary group personal accident insurance cover, underwritten by Singapore Life Ltd.)
Please refer to the respective fund share class factsheet available on Fullertonâ€™s
website
These differences reflect the unique servicing arrangements and distribution partnerships for each share class. Nonetheless, regardless of share class, investors across all share classes will benefit from Fullertonâ€™s disciplined approach in their cash management strategy.

Title: How do I log in to the GXS Bank app? - GXS Help Centre

Open the GXS Bank app and follow the onscreen instructions. To access your account, youâ€™ll have to verify your identity via Singpass, email OTP and passcode. The good news is youâ€™ll only have to do this once on a new device. After verification, your device becomes a registered device and future logins will be quick and easy. Do note that you can only have one registered device at any one time.
On your registered device

here
.

Title: What does each value in my investment holdings details mean? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/GXS_Invest_Features/What_does_each_value_in_my_investment_holdings_details_mean%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:25:40.689738
Word Count: 192
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

â€˜Current valueâ€™
reflects the value of your unit holdings multiplied by the latest published unit price.
Current value = Unit holdings x Unit price
For example: 1,000 unit holdings x S$1.203 unit price = S$1,203 current value
If you have an ongoing â€˜Buyâ€™ order, your allocated units will be ready for viewing in your account when the order is indicated as â€˜Completedâ€™.
If you have an ongoing â€˜Sell orderâ€™, your units will be removed from your account when the order is indicated as 'Confirmedâ€™.
â€˜Total returnsâ€™
represents the total cumulative gain or loss since your first investment. It is the sum of returns from your existing investment holdings (unrealised returns) and returns from investments you have sold (realised returns).
Returns from units held is the profit (or loss) from the investments you still own.
Returns from units sold is the profit (or loss) from the investments you have already sold.
â€˜Unit holdingsâ€™
represents the total number of units in the fund that you own. It is also the number of units you have available to sell.
â€˜Unit priceâ€™
is the latest published price per unit (or Net Asset Value) of the fund.

================================================================================

Title: How are fresh funds calculated? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/Pocket_is_Right_campaign/How_are_fresh_funds_calculated%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:25:43.643280
Word Count: 25
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Fresh funds is the incremental amount of balances in your GXS Savings Account over the total balances in your account as of 31 March 2025.

================================================================================

Title: How long do I need to hold the funds for in my GXS Biz Account? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/GXS_Biz_Account_2025_Year-End_Promotion/How_long_do_I_need_to_hold_the_funds_for_in_my_GXS_Biz_Account%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:25:50.971118
Word Count: 73
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

To qualify for the reward under this campaign, you will need to hold the funds for at least 60 days in your GXS Biz Account from and including the date of depositing funds. Funds must be deposited between 11 November and 31 December 2025.
For example, if you deposit your funds on 15 December 2025, you will need to hold the funds until 13 February 2026 in order to qualify for the reward.

================================================================================

Title: How do I request an audit confirmation? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz/Manage_GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz/How_do_I_request_an_audit_confirmation%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:26:08.516475
Word Count: 99
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

You can request an audit confirmation "Submit an enquiry" via the Help Centre on the GXS Bank app. Only the authorised person can make this request.
To submit your request, provide:
Date for the audit confirmation.
Name and email address of your auditor.
(Optional) Auditorâ€™s reference number.
Once processed, the confirmation report will be emailed to you. The report is password-protected, so ensure you share the password with your auditor.
Requests might be rejected if it is not from the authorised user, or if duplicate requests are made for the same period. If thereâ€™s a problem, youâ€™ll be notified.

Title: How do I close my GXS Biz Account? - GXS Help Centre

Once you've done this, reach out to us to close your GXS Biz Account. Our Customer Support Team is available everydayÂ via:
GXS Bank app, Help Centre: GXS Chat
GXS Hotline: 1800 866 6685Â or (+65) 6866 6685 (from overseas)

Title: What are fresh funds and how is it calculated? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/Pocket_is_Right_campaign/What_are_fresh_funds_and_how_is_it_calculated%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:26:23.690629
Word Count: 66
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Fresh funds means funds not transferred or withdrawn from any existing GXS Savings Account (i.e. not transferred from a Main Account, any Saving Pocket, or any Boost Pocket), and re-deposited into your GXS Savings Account.
For this Campaign, fresh funds will be the incremental amount of balances in your GXS Savings Account over the total balances in your GXS Savings Account as of 31 March 2025.

================================================================================

Title: What is GXS FlexiLoan Biz? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz/Apply_for_a_GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz/What_is_GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:27:11.920190
Word Count: 201
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

When you apply for GXS FlexiLoan Biz, you get access to a revolving line of credit from which you can borrow loans from.
What is a revolving line of credit?
You have the flexibility to borrow a loan from the credit line only when you need it
No interest or fees will be charged if you do not borrow from the credit line
You can borrow multiple loans up to your credit limit
What are the benefits of GXS FlexiLoan Biz?
Enjoy low interest rates of up to 4.99%p.a.(EIR 9.32%p.a.)
Borrow instantly at the click of a button
Before borrowing a loan, all interest rates and fees are clearly displayed to you so you can make the best choice
Flexibility to select a monthly repayment date that works for your business
No early repayment fees
No annual fees
No late fees, but a late interest is chargeable if you do not make your loan repayments on time
You can borrow up to 10 loans from your available credit limit
* Effective Interest Rate (EIR) for GXS FlexiLoan Biz is calculated based on an average loan amount of S$10,000 with a 24-month repayment period, from 1 January 2024 to 1 January 2026.

================================================================================

Title: Can I change my PayNow name? - GXS Help Centre

Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:26:26.523088

Title: When is my first monthly GXS FlexiLoan Biz repayment due? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz/GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz_Repayment/When_is_my_first_monthly_GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz_repayment_due%3F
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:27:20.726595
Word Count: 57
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Your first monthly GXS FlexiLoan Biz repayment due date will fall at least one month from the date that you've borrowed your first loan.
For example, if you borrow your first loan on 15 January and you've selected the 20th of every month as your repayment date, your first monthly repayment date will be on 20 February.

================================================================================

For example, if you borrow your first loan on 15 January and you've selected the 20th of every month as your repayment date, your first monthly repayment date will be on 20 February.

Title: What is GXS FlexiLoan Biz? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz/Apply_for_a_GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz/What_is_GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:28:44.340697
Word Count: 201
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

When you apply for GXS FlexiLoan Biz, you get access to a revolving line of credit from which you can borrow loans from.
What is a revolving line of credit?
You have the flexibility to borrow a loan from the credit line only when you need it
No interest or fees will be charged if you do not borrow from the credit line
You can borrow multiple loans up to your credit limit
What are the benefits of GXS FlexiLoan Biz?
Enjoy low interest rates of up to 4.99%p.a.(EIR 9.32%p.a.)
Borrow instantly at the click of a button
Before borrowing a loan, all interest rates and fees are clearly displayed to you so you can make the best choice
Flexibility to select a monthly repayment date that works for your business
No early repayment fees
No annual fees
No late fees, but a late interest is chargeable if you do not make your loan repayments on time
You can borrow up to 10 loans from your available credit limit
* Effective Interest Rate (EIR) for GXS FlexiLoan Biz is calculated based on an average loan amount of S$10,000 with a 24-month repayment period, from 1 January 2024 to 1 January 2026.

================================================================================

Title: When is my first monthly GXS FlexiLoan Biz repayment due? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz/GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz_Repayment/When_is_my_first_monthly_GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz_repayment_due%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:28:47.190290
Word Count: 57
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Your first monthly GXS FlexiLoan Biz repayment due date will fall at least one month from the date that you've borrowed your first loan.
For example, if you borrow your first loan on 15 January and you've selected the 20th of every month as your repayment date, your first monthly repayment date will be on 20 February.

Title: What are the E-Payments User Protection Guidelines? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/Keeping_your_GXS_Biz_Account_Payments_and_Money_Secure/What_are_the_E-Payments_User_Protection_Guidelines%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:27:11.510328
Word Count: 243
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

The Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) has issued these Guidelines on the roles and responsibilities of banks and customers when it comes to Electronic Payments (E-Payments).
The Guidelines establish a common baseline protection that Financial Institutions will provide to individuals and sole proprietors from losses arising from unauthorised or erroneous e-payment transactions from their protected accounts.
What is a protected account?
In the Guidelines, protected accounts are:
Held by either individuals or sole proprietors (business owners), including those held jointly by multiple account holders, and can hold a balance of S$500 or more at any time or is a credit facility and is capable of being used for E-Payment transactions
What E-Payments do the Guidelines cover?
The Guidelines cover all payments initiated through electronic means, and funds received through electronic means. These include online payments and transfers.
How do the Guidelines protect me?
As an E-Payments user, the Guidelines set out your responsibilities to adopt good security practices. These include how you should protect your device, login credentials, access codes and protected accounts.
We send you transaction notifications so youâ€™re alerted of unauthorised transactions. There are also multiple channels of reaching us if you need to report any unauthorised transactions.
We will investigate claims of unauthorised transactions, with the aim of achieving a fair and reasonable resolution.
You can read about the Guidelines listed down by MAS and FAQs by ABS below.
E-Payment Guidelines from MAS:
www.mas.gov.sg/regulation/guidelines/guidelines-for-e-payments-user-protection
E-Payment Guidelines FAQ from ABS:
www.abs.org.sg/consumer-banking/consumers/faq---e-payment-guidelines

================================================================================

Title: What happens if my account balance drops below S$100,000 even for one day? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/GXS_Biz_Account_2025_Year-End_Promotion/What_happens_if_my_account_balance_drops_below_S%24100%2C000_even_for_one_day%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:27:23.494314
Word Count: 52
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Your end-of-day account balance must remain at or above S$100,000 for 60 consecutive days. If the end-of-day balance drops below this amount at any time during the 60-day period, you will not be eligible for the reward under this promotion.
However, you will still receive the usual daily interest of 1.08% p.a.

Title: What is the complimentary Group Personal Accident Coverage? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/Complimentary_SingLife_Insurance/What_is_the_complimentary_Group_Personal_Accident_Coverage%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:27:26.278312
Word Count: 130
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Eligible customers who purchase the Fullerton SGD Cash Fund - Class G through GXS Bank will receive a complimentary Group Personal Accident insurance coverage, underwritten by Singapore Life Ltd (Singlife) and will be insured up to 3 times the investment amount in the event of death or Total and Permanent Disability, subject to a maximum of S$100,000.
â€œInvestment amountâ€ refers to the market value of the Fullerton SGD Cash Fund as of the day of the accident. The market value will be determined by multiplying the units owned by you by the Unit Price as of the day of accident.
If you are 65 age next birthday and above at the time of accident, the coverage would be reduced to 50% of benefits payable, subject to a maximum of S$50,000.

================================================================================

Title: What is the cut-off time for Buy or Sell orders? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/GXS_Invest_Orders/What_is_the_cut-off_time_for_Buy_or_Sell_orders%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:28:04.384708
Word Count: 135
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

This is the specific time on a given dealing day that your transaction will be considered for that day's value. Itâ€™s important to know this time so you can plan and ensure your transaction is recorded correctly. The cut-off time to transact on GXS Invest is 3:30pm every business day.
For Buy orders placed before 3:30pm, your allocated units will be reflected in your account on the next business day.
For Buy orders placed after 3:30pm or on a non-business day, your allocated units will be reflected in your account the following business day instead.
For Sell orders placed before 3:30pm, you will receive your proceeds on the next business day.
For Sell orders placed after 3:30pm or on a non-business day, you can generally expect to receive your proceeds the following business day instead.

================================================================================

Nope, there isn't! Once the recipient is added as 'Favourite', you can proceed to transfer money to that recipient.

Title: What is the eligibility criteria of the Group Personal Accident coverage? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/Complimentary_SingLife_Insurance/What_is_the_eligibility_criteria_of_the_Group_Personal_Accident_coverage%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:28:22.247350
Word Count: 107
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

You are eligible for the insurance coverage if you meet the following requirements:
- You are between 19 and 75 years old Age Next Birthday (both ages inclusive);
- You are a unitholder of the Fullerton SGD Cash Fund (Share Class G) purchased through GXS Bank Pte. Ltd.;
- You are a Singaporean citizen, Singapore Permanent Resident or holders of valid Singapore employment pass but excludes work permit holders;
- You are a resident of Singapore;
- You are not a Prohibited Person (as defined in the Insurance Product Summary); and
- Your application for cover under this Group Personal Accident Plan has been approved by Singlife

Title: What should I do if Singpass Face Verification fails? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Using_the_App/What_should_I_do_if_Singpass_Face_Verification_fails%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:28:37.916388
Word Count: 120
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

There are several steps you can take to troubleshoot and resolve the issue:
Check Lighting and Visibility:
Ensure that your face is well-lit and clearly visible. Poor lighting conditions can interfere with the face recognition process.
Remove any accessories that might obscure your face, such as sunglasses, hats, or masks. These can prevent the system from getting a clear view of your face features.
Camera Functionality:
Make sure your device's camera is functioning properly. Clean the camera lens to ensure there are no smudges or dirt affecting the image quality.
Verify that your camera is not damaged and is capable of capturing clear images.
Reference:
https://ask.gov.sg/singpass/question...agencyhomepage
If the issue persists, you may need to contact
Singpass Helpdesk
for further assistance.

Click on 'Me'.
Select 'Manage data sharing'Â to withdraw your consent.

Title: What is Singpass Face Verification? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Using_the_App/What_is_Singpass_Face_Verification%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:28:53.087974
Word Count: 85
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Singpass Face Verification is designed to provide a convenient and secure way for users to access various government and private sector services in Singapore. This method enhances security by adding an additional layer of authentication beyond traditional passwords or PINs.
The process typically involves the user taking a live photo or scanning their face using their device's camera. The system then compares this live image against the government's records (CPF Board).
For more information on Singpass Face Verification, you can refer to
Singpass Helpdesk
.

================================================================================

Title: Can I change my guess amount and when is the guess amount locked in? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/Pocket_is_Right_campaign/Can_I_change_my_guess_amount_and_when_is_the_guess_amount_locked_in%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:29:06.097735
Word Count: 79
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Yes, you can change your guess amount anytime during the guess period by depositing more funds or withdrawing funds from your Saving Pocket.
Your guess amount will be locked based on the day end balance on the last day of the month, less any interest credited.
You will then have to hold the fresh funds amount for the hold period of 1 month. Winners of the Grand Prize will be announced on the 30th day of the next month.

Title: Is there a detailed guide I can refer to for opening a GXS Biz Account? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/Open_a_GXS_Biz_Account/Is_there_a_detailed_guide_I_can_refer_to_for_opening_a_GXS_Biz_Account%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:29:21.713876
Word Count: 450
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Hereâ€™s a step-by-step guide to opening a GXS Biz Account, once youâ€™ve received an invite from us.
Search for 'GXS Bank'Â in Apple Store or Google Play Store. Download the latest version and launch it.
You should then see the options to view Personal banking or Business banking.
Tap on 'Business banking' and the next page should show you the GXS Biz Account. Tap on â€˜Sign Up Nowâ€™ to begin the application process.
You'll then be asked to log in with your Singpass details, in order for your personal and ACRA information to be shared with GXS Bank.
Once youâ€™ve provided your consent and approval, the next few screens will display your personal and company information retrieved from Singpass MyInfo and ACRA respectively.
Tap on â€˜Nextâ€™ accordingly.
Do check the information displayed to ensure that the information retrieved is valid and accurate. If you'd like to change the pre-filled information at anytime, just tap the arrow down on the right of the screen to display the dropdown options.
Next, we'd like to know more about your business information. When you encounter this next screen below, just fill in the details accordingly.
Purpose of business - Do pick the option closest to your line of business. If in doubt, select â€˜Othersâ€™ and there will be a text-based field for you to key in.
Annual business income - Select a range from â€˜less than $100,000â€™ to â€˜more than $1,000,000'.
Anticipated level of account activity - We would like to know how often you may need to make a deposit or withdrawal of your GXS Biz Account. Select a range from 0 to above 1,000 transactions.
Anticipated amount of each transaction - For each deposit or withdrawal made in your GXS Biz Account, we would like to know the average amount of each transaction.
Source of funds - If in doubt, select â€˜Othersâ€™ and there will be a text-based field for you to key in.
Youâ€™re nearly done!
Tap on â€˜Get Bothâ€™ if youâ€™d like to proceed with the bundled application. Or if you prefer to proceed with just a savings account for now, just tap on â€˜Get GXS Biz Accountâ€™.
If your application is showing this message, don't worry. We may simply need a bit more time to assess your eligibility.
Just sit back, relax and wait for a notification from us within 2 business days.
If at any point you require further clarification or assistance, our Customer Support Team is here for you 24/7. Just reach out to us via:
GXS app, Help Centre: GXS Chat (Recommended)
GXS app, Help Centre: Submit an enquiry
GXS Hotline: 1800 866 6685 or (+65) 6866 6685 (from overseas)
GXS Customer Support Email:
help@gxs.com.sg

Title: Are my GXS Biz Account deposits with GXS Bank protected or insured? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/Fund_GXS_Biz_Account/Are_my_GXS_Biz_Account_deposits_with_GXS_Bank_protected_or_insured%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:29:24.503705
Word Count: 72
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Your deposits in your GXS Biz Account are insured up to S$100,000 by the Singapore Deposit Insurance Corporation (SDIC), under the Deposit Insurance Scheme. Here's a description of the scheme:
Singapore dollar deposits of non-bank depositors are insured by the Singapore Deposit Insurance Corporation, for up to S$100,000 in aggregate per depositor per Scheme member by law. Foreign currency deposits, dual currency investments, structured deposits and other investment products are not insured.

Title: I am a GrabFood merchant with multiple outlets, and a GXS Biz Account customer. Will all my outlets qualify for the reward? - GXS Help Centre

Title: How many users can operate the GXS Biz Account and GXS FlexiLoan Biz? - GXS Help Centre

Title: What is the Notice for the 'Cancellation Period for Collective Investment Schemes Constituted as Unit Trusts'? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/7_Day_Cancellation_Period/What_is_the_Notice_for_the_'Cancellation_Period_for_Collective_Investment_Schemes_Constituted_as_Unit_Trusts'%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:29:48.797006
Word Count: 110
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

In accordance with the requirements under the MAS Notice on Cancellation Period for Units in Authorised Collective Investment Scheme, you have the right to cancel your buy order within 7 calendar days from the date of purchase.
If the last day of the cancellation period falls on a Sunday or public holiday in Singapore, the cancellation period will be extended to the next business day.
If you have existing holdings in this fund or this is your second or subsequent buy order in this fund, the right to cancel will not apply, unless your second or subsequent Buy order was made within the 7-day cancellation period of your first order.

================================================================================

Title: How is the randomised sure-win cash reward determined? - GXS Help Centre

Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

To be eligible for the sure-win cashback ensure you deposit a minimum of S$2,000 into your Saving Pocket which is named after the featured destination. The sure-win cash reward amount is randomly generated by our system and ranges between S$1.00 to S$20.00.
Do note the sure-win randomised cash reward is limited to one reward per customer, per month. It will be credited to your GXS Savings Account at the end of the holding period.

Title: Can I schedule future or recurring FAST/ PayNow transfers? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/GXS_Biz_Account_Payments/Can_I_schedule_future_or_recurring_FAST%2F%2F_PayNow_transfers%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:30:13.571018
Word Count: 94
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Yes, you can definitely schedule one-time or recurring FAST/PayNow transfers for a future date. Hereâ€™s how to do it in the GXS Bank app:
1. Open your GXS Bank app.
2. Tap on "Send Money" on the top bar.
3. Select method of transfer.
4. Enter the recipient's Account number or proxy details.
5. Under "Types of transfers", choose "Scheduled transfer" and enter a name for the scheduled transfer.
6. Select the transfer frequency.
7. Set the start date.
8. Select number of times to transfer.
9. Review and approve the transfer schedule summary.

Title: What are the fees charged on my investments? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/Fees_and_Charges/What_are_the_fees_charged_on_my_investments%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:30:19.295143
Word Count: 131
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

GXS Bank does not charge any transaction fees when you buy or sell the Fullerton SGD Cash Fund through us. This means there are no front-end sales charges, withdrawal fees or platform fees, and we ensure that your full investment is put to work, and 100% of your money is actively invested.
The annual management fee is already factored into each dealing day's published unit price, and there are no further deductions made when units in the fund are bought or sold.
For more information on fees, you may refer to the Fee Schedule that can be found in the GXS Bank app. To access the fund documents:
1. Log in to your GXS Bank App.
2. Proceed to the GXS Invest homescreen.
3. Tap on â€˜Moreâ€™.
4. Select â€˜Fee Scheduleâ€™.

================================================================================

Title: Can I change my GXS FlexiLoan Biz loan repayment date or loan tenure after borrowing a loan? - GXS Help Centre

Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:30:22.278957
Word Count: 54
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Unfortunately, you won't be able to. But here is what you can do instead:
Repay your outstanding loan(s).
Borrow a new loan with the new repayment date and loan tenure.
Make sure to keep track of your new repayment date and stay on top of your repayments to avoid late interest charges or penalties.

Title: As a new investor in GXS Invest, what are some of the risks that I need to be aware of? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/General_Risk_Disclosures/As_a_new_investor_in_GXS_Invest%2C_what_are_some_of_the_risks_that_I_need_to_be_aware_of%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:30:31.185103
Word Count: 345
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Before making an informed decision to purchase an investment product, please read through the following risk disclosures. It is important that you understand and acknowledge them before making your purchase.
1) All investments come with risks, and you may lose all or part of your investment. Investments are not deposits and should not be treated as deposits.
2) You have received, read and understood the relevant prospectus or other offering document and, where applicable, the product highlights sheet or other materials or documents relating to the investment product which you are applying to invest into, and agree to be bound by the prospectus and offering and constitutive documents of the investment product.
3) Past performance of an investment does not necessarily reflect its future performance. Any indicative return and/or distribution rate (where applicable) is for illustrative purposes only, and is not a prediction, projection or forecast of the future performance of the investment. There is no guarantee that the indicative return and/or distribution rate (where applicable) will be achieved. The value of investments and investment returns (including dividends, distributions, income or other returns) may rise or fall.
4) You are fully aware of the risks involved in the investment, including the risks set out in the Invest Account Terms, and you undertake all investments and investment transactions at your sole risk.
5) You will be responsible for your own investment decisions. GXS Bank does not offer investment advice of any nature, and any information which we provide is not offered as investment advice or recommendations. Any such information which we provide is intended for general circulation and does not take into account the specific investment objectives, financial situation or particular needs of any particular person. You should not place any reliance on us as giving you any advice or making any recommendations. Where necessary, you should seek your own independent financial, professional or other advice.
6) Unless we inform you otherwise, we are acting as your agent in the investment transaction.
This advertisement or publication has not been reviewed by the Monetary Authority of Singapore

Title: What are the available crediting methods when I wish to sell my investments? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/GXS_Invest_Orders/What_are_the_available_crediting_methods_when_I_wish_to_sell_my_investments%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:30:40.207958
Word Count: 141
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Currently, you can only receive the redemption proceeds into the Main Account of your GXS Savings Account. Simply follow these steps:
1. Log in to the GXS Bank app and proceed to the GXS Invest home screen.
2. On the â€˜Sell Orderâ€™ page, select GXS Savings Account Main Account as your crediting method.
3. Key in a Sell amount. Do ensure the amount does not exceed your â€˜Available Amountâ€™*.
4. Review your order details in the order summary page.
5. Acknowledge that you have read the Invest Account Terms, Fund Documents as well as Risk Disclosures.
6. Tap on â€˜Sellâ€™ to proceed with the redemption.
*Available amount is the amount you can redeem, excluding any pending Sell order(s). If you have recently made any Buy order(s), that amount can only be redeemed after 2 business days from the day of purchase.

Title: My company has foreign directors and/or shareholders. Can the company still be onboarded? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/Open_a_GXS_Biz_Account/My_company_has_foreign_directors_and%2F%2For_shareholders._Can_the_company_still_be_onboarded%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:30:43.163283
Word Count: 63
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

We are unable to onboard if all directors and major shareholders in your company are foreign nationals without Singapore PR status.
To be eligible, your company must meet these two requirements:
Directors:
At least two directors must be a Singapore Citizen or Singapore Permanent Resident.
Shareholders:
All major shareholders (holding 25% or more of shares) must be a Singapore Citizen or Singapore PR.

Title: I already hold a GXS Savings / GXS FlexiLoan / GXS FlexiCard account. Am I eligible for the cashback reward? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/Q4_Brand_campaign/I_already_hold_a_GXS_Savings_%2F%2F_GXS_FlexiLoan_%2F%2F_GXS_FlexiCard_account._Am_I_eligible_for_the_cashback_reward%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:30:49.212590
Word Count: 61
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

If you are an existing GXS user, but are a new GXS Savings Account, GXS FlexiLoan or GXS FlexiCard holder, you will still be eligible for the cashback reward for that new product!
For example, if you already hold a GXS Savings Account but do not have a GXS FlexiCard, you will be eligible for the GXS FlexiCard "Spend Cashback" reward.

Title: Why was my Buy order reversed? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/GXS_Invest_Orders/Why_was_my_Buy_order_reversed%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:31:04.862553
Word Count: 90
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Unfortunately, we may have encountered an error while processing your order. When this happens, we will initiate a refund of the purchase amount to your GXS Savings Account, following which, you may choose to place a new buy order again.
Please ensure that your total balance (including any refunds and interest accruals) does not exceed the maximum balance amount that you can hold in your GXS Savings Account.
View the status of your Buy order by tapping â€˜Transactionsâ€™ on the GXS Invest home screen and selecting the relevant Buy order.

Title: My Sell order has been completed but the monies have not yet been credited to my account. Why is this so? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/GXS_Invest_Orders/My_Sell_order_has_been_completed_but_the_monies_have_not_yet_been_credited_to_my_account._Why_is_this_so%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:31:11.069184
Word Count: 134
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

We were unable to credit the monies to your GXS Savings Account, if doing so would cause the available balance in your GXS Savings Account to exceed the prevailing maximum balance amount. To receive your redemption proceeds, you will need to reduce the balance in your GXS Savings Account first.
Follow these simple steps to find out the maximum balance amount for your GXS Savings Account:
1. Log in to the GXS Bank app.
2. Tap on the 3 dots next to your â€˜GXS SAVINGS ACCOUNT'.
3. Tap on â€˜View balance infoâ€™.
For further enquiries, you can reach out to our Customer Service team:
- GXS Bank app, Help Centre: GXS Chat (Recommended)
- GXS Bank app, Help Centre: Contact Us form
- GXS Hotline: Â 1800 866 6685Â or (+65) 6866 6685 (from overseas)

Date for the audit confirmation.
Name and email address of your auditor.
(Optional) Auditorâ€™s reference number.
Once processed, the confirmation report will be emailed to you. The report is password-protected, so ensure you share the password with your auditor.
Requests might be rejected if it is not from the authorised user, or if duplicate requests are made for the same period. If thereâ€™s a problem, youâ€™ll be notified.

Title: Is there a daily transaction limit for performing My Singtel transactions using funds from my GXS Savings Account? - GXS Help Centre

Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Title: Who is eligible to open a GXS Invest account? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/Opening_a_GXS_Invest_Account/Who_is_eligible_to_open_a_GXS_Invest_account%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:31:42.036924
Word Count: 135
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

You can open a GXS Invest account if:
You are a Singapore Citizen, Permanent Resident, or foreigner with a valid pass
You have a Singpass Myinfo account
You are at least 18 years old
You are residing in Singapore
You open or hold a GXS Savings Account
Due to restrictions stated in the fund(s) prospectus, we are unable to offer our investment products to US citizens, including US Permanent Residents and Green Card Holders.
To open a GXS Invest account, your personal information on Singpass Myinfo has to be accurate and up-to-date. Do ensure that Singpass Myinfo has your latest updated details such as your residential address, email, and phone number. If you need any help updating your information or accessing your Singpass account, you can reach out to the Singpass Helpdesk for further assistance.

================================================================================

Title: For Grab transactions paid with GXS Savings Account on my Grab app that require a refund, will the money be refunded to the GXS Savings Account? - GXS Help Centre

Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Yes. If your linked GXS Savings Account is used as the payment method on the Grab app for a transaction that is to be given a refund, the refund will be sent to your GXS Savings Account.

Title: How is my GXS account(s) protected? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Keeping_Your_Data_and_Device_Secure/How_is_my_GXS_account(s)_protected%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:31:47.982589
Word Count: 164
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Your data and account security are our utmost priority. To protect your account and information, we've set up a multi-layered defence against fraud.
We employ secure technology and protocols to keep your information and money safe. For example, only one device can access your GXS account at any time. Logging in to your GXS account on a new device will automatically deregister your old device.
We've established a dedicated anti-fraud team to monitor and review fraud alerts, and for intervention work.
We screen all transactions with our advanced monitoring and surveillance systems to detect unusual activities on our customers' accounts. This helps us prevent or interveneÂ potential unauthorised transactions.
Apart from these measures, it's crucial to stay vigilant against fraud and scams. If you have questions or concerns, feel free to reach us at:
GXS app, Help Centre: GXS Chat (Recommended)
GXS app, Help Centre: Submit an enquiry
GXS Hotline: 1800 866 6685 or (+65) 6866 6685 (from overseas)
GXS Customer Support Email:
help@gxs.com.sg

================================================================================

Title: How do I link and pay with my GXS Savings Account on my Grab app? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Grab_and_Singtel_Experiences/GXS_on_Grab/How_do_I_link_and_pay_with_my_GXS_Savings_Account_on_my_Grab_app%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:31:51.305430
Word Count: 139
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Hereâ€™s how you can link your GXS Savings Account to your Grab app:
From your Grab app home screen, tap on the 'Finance' tab.
Select 'Activate GXS Savings Account'.
Follow the on-screen instructions to link your GXS Savings Account.
Once done, you will be able to use your GXS Savings Account as a payment method for Grab Transport, Food, Mart or Express in the Grab app and earn 1.2X GrabRewards points each time! For even greater convenience, you may want to set your GXS Savings Account as the primary payment method.
Do note that a 12-hour freeze for high risk transactions will be imposed upon linking your GXS Savings Account to Grab. During this period, you will not be able to transfer large amounts of cash or increase your daily transfer limit on your Grab and GXS Bank app.

================================================================================

Title: Where can I find my GXS FlexiLoan Biz interest rates? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz/GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz_-_Interest_and_Fees/Where_can_I_find_my_GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz_interest_rates%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:32:10.175062
Word Count: 118
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Your interest rate (APR and EIR) will be shared with you upon successful application along with your assigned credit limit, so that you have all the details you need to make an informed decision on whether you wish to take up on the offer.
You may also find your interest rate within the GXS Bank app home screen right beneath your GXS FlexiLoan Biz credit limit.
*The Annual Percentage Rate (APR) represents the total borrowing cost, expressed as a yearly rate, relative to the initial loan amount.
The Effective Interest Rate (EIR) is the rate that reflects the true cost of borrowing and takes into account total charges. It's computed over a reducing balance basis and accrued daily.

================================================================================

Title: For Dash transactions paid with GXS Savings Account on my Dash app that require a refund, will the money be refunded to the GXS Savings Account? - GXS Help Centre

================================================================================

No. If your linked GXS Savings Account is used as the payment method on the Dash app for a transaction that is to be given a refund, the refund will be sent to your Dash Wallet.

Title: What is GXS Invest? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/GXS_Invest_Features/What_is_GXS_Invest%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:32:22.394144
Word Count: 144
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

GXS Invest is a product by GXS Bank that provides access to investment product(s), including the Fullerton SGD Cash Fund - Class G ("Fullerton SGD Cash Fund").
Fullerton SGD Cash Fund is actively managed by Fullerton Fund Management, a Temasek Holdings and Income Insurance backed asset management company. The Fund seeks to provide investors with liquidity while achieving a return that is comparable to the SGD Bank Saving Deposits rate by investing primarily into Singapore Dollar-denominated deposits as well as Singapore government related bills.
Eligible customers invested in Fullerton SGD Cash Fund purchased through GXS Bank will also receive a complimentary group personal accident insurance coverage of up to 3 times the investment amount, subject to a maximum of S$100,000, underwritten by Singapore Life Ltd ("Singlife").
For more information on the Group Personal Accident insurance coverage, refer to the FAQ section on â€˜Singlife Insuranceâ€™.

================================================================================

Word Count: 39
Is FAQ Answer: True

We are working to avail alternative funding and crediting sources in the near future. Do keep a lookout for it!
In the meantime, you can only fund your investment purchases and receive sale proceeds to/from your GXS Savings Account.

Title: What are the benefits of using Singpass Face Verification? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Using_the_App/What_are_the_benefits_of_using_Singpass_Face_Verification%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:32:40.872643
Word Count: 122
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

There are several key benefits to using Singpass Face Verification, each contributing to a more secure and convenient user experience:
Security
: It provides a high level of security by ensuring that the person attempting to access the service is the legitimate user.
Convenience
: Users can authenticate their identity quickly and easily without needing to remember passwords or carry physical identification documents.
Integration
: It is seamlessly integrated with various services that require identity verification, making it a versatile tool for both personal and business use.
Overall, Singpass Face Verification offers a robust, secure, and user-friendly method for identity authentication, enhancing the digital experience for GXS Bank users.
For more information on Singpass Face Verification, you can refer to
Singpass Helpdesk.

Title: Can I repay my GXS FlexiLoan Biz monthly repayment amount early? - GXS Help Centre

Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:32:46.760604
Word Count: 88
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

You can make monthly repayments at any time, and we won't charge you any fees for early repayments! When you repay early, the amount will be deducted from your principal balance before your scheduled repayment date.
Choose the option that best suits you:
1. Manual repayments: You can manually initiate repayments from your GXS Biz Account at any time before or on the repayment due date.
2. Repayment from a third-party bank account: You can transfer funds from an external bank account to your GXS FlexiLoan Biz account.

Title: What promotional interest rates are applicable to me in this GXS Business Banking Your Best Interest Campaign? - GXS Help Centre

This promotional rate of 4.99%p.a. (9.32% EIR) will be available from 1 March to 30 JuneÂ 2025.
If you wish to get this promotional rate of 4.99%p.a. extended after the period, simply borrow a minimum loan amount of S$1,000 with a minimum of 4 months tenure and ensure you repay your next 3 instalments on due date. The promotional rate of 4.99%p.a. will then be applied to your GXS Flexiloan Biz permanently.

Title: I have recently submitted a Buy order. Why can't I sell my investments? - GXS Help Centre

Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:32:53.439811
Word Count: 46
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

For newly submitted buy orders, you may only sell your allocated units after a cool-down period of 2 business days starting from the trade date.
This waiting period is in place to ensure that your newly allocated units are properly registered before they can be sold.

Title: How is daily interest calculated for GXS Biz Account? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/GXS_Biz_Account_Interest_and_Fees/How_is_daily_interest_calculated_for_GXS_Biz_Account%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:33:11.724094
Word Count: 158
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

You earn interest daily based on the balance of your GXS Biz Account at the end of each day. Interest earned on the account balance is 1.08% per annum.
We multiply your balance by the interest rate per annum over 365 days. Interest will be credited to your account when you earn at least S$0.01 in accumulated interest.
For example, based on an interest rate of 1.08% per annum applicable on balances in your GXS Biz Account:
On 2Â AugustÂ 2025, your balance in your GXS Biz Account is S$40,000. You will earn an accrued interest of S$1.18356.
S$1.18Â will be credited to your account on 3 AugustÂ 2025Â morning. Your balance will now be S$40,001.18. The remaining S$0.00356Â will continue to accrue the next day
Terms and conditions apply. For full GXS Business Banking Terms and Conditions, visit:
Business Account Terms
here
.
Biz Ecosystem Terms - Grab
here
.
Biz Ecosystem Terms - Singtel
here
.

================================================================================

Title: Can I delete a scheduled transfer? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/GXS_Biz_Account_Payments/Can_I_delete_a_scheduled_transfer%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:33:14.799031
Word Count: 63
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Absolutely! You can easily remove a scheduled transfer in the GXS Bank app. Here's how:
1. Tap on "Send Money" on the top bar.
2. In the Scheduled Transfers section, tap the ellipsis button next to the scheduled transfer you want to delete.
3. Choose "Remove scheduled transfer."
4. Confirm by tapping "Remove."
Your scheduled transfer will then be removed from the list.

Title: How do I identify an official GXS SMS/email or check that it's not a scam? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Keeping_Your_Data_and_Device_Secure/How_do_I_identify_an_official_GXS_SMS%2F%2Femail_or_check_that_it's_not_a_scam%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:33:31.313021
Word Count: 94
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

If there's a link in an SMS or email, that's not us! Our SMS and email notifications do not contain any clickable links. Alerts with a clickable link will be sent as push notifications on the GXS Bank app instead.
To confirm the validity of your messages, check your GXS inbox on the official GXS Bank app. Alternatively, you can also reach us at:
GXS app, Help Centre: GXS Chat (Recommended)
GXS app, Help Centre: Submit an enquiry
GXS Hotline: 1800 866 6685 or (+65) 6866 6685 (from overseas)
GXS Customer Support Email:

Title: How does GXS Bank use my personal data? - GXS Help Centre
