Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:33:37.171466
Word Count: 72
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

We use your data to:
Confirm your identity.
Respond to queries and feedback.
Enhance our products and services.
Execute our day-to-day business and administrative operations.
Comply with laws and legal obligations, and our GXS Bank policies.
Perform checks so as to prevent and detect crime, and for risk management purposes.
Note that this is a non-exhaustive list. For more details, please refer to our full Data Protection Policy on GXS Bank website.

Title: How do I report an alleged fraud attempt or scam? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/Keeping_your_GXS_Biz_Account_Payments_and_Money_Secure/How_do_I_report_an_alleged_fraud_attempt_or_scam%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:33:49.475140
Word Count: 336
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Weâ€™re here for you every step of the way. Contact us immediately so that we can suspend your GXS Bank account(s) and take you through the fraud reporting process. Next, lodge an online police report at the Singapore Police Force (SPF) website or visit your nearest police station. Reach us at:
GXS Bank app, Help Centre: GXS Chat
GXS Hotline: 1800 866 6685 or (+65) 6866 6685 (from overseas).
Hereâ€™s an overview of the reporting process so you know what to expect. There are two steps to take when thereâ€™s a suspected fraud or scam:
Suspend your account
You can suspend your account immediately through our voice automated system or speak to one of our agents via call or Live Chat. After your account has been suspended, our agent will ask you for details such as the date and time of the incident. To suspend your account via our voice automated system,
1. Call us at GXS Hotline: 1800 866 6685 or (+65) 6866 6685 (from overseas).
2. Press 1 and verify your NRIC and date of birth. Your account will be suspended immediately.
Lodge a police report
To file a police report, you can either:
File it online: The SPF has an e-services portal where you can file certain types of reports online. Just go to their website and look for the "e-Report" section.
Call the SPF Hotline: For urgent matters that need immediate police attention, you can SMS 70999 or call '999'. For non-urgent matters, you can call '1800-255-0000'. They will advise you on the next steps, which might include filing a report in person.
Visit a police station: Head to your nearest Neighbourhood Police Centre (NPC) or Police Divisional Headquarters. The officers there will assist you with taking your report.
You may not have lost money, but this is important if youâ€™ve given your personal information to anyone claiming to be from GXS Bank via call, links, or email. Our agent will follow up with an email to request for the police report.

================================================================================

Title: What are confirmation notes and how do I retrieve them? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/GXS_Invest_Documentation/What_are_confirmation_notes_and_how_do_I_retrieve_them%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:33:55.666100
Word Count: 117
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Confirmation notes serve to provide you with the details of your Buy or Sell transactions (including the trade date, executed unit price as well as the number of units) once the orders have been completed.
Here's how you can view your confirmation notes:
1. Log in to the GXS Bank app.
2. Proceed to the GXS Invest home screen.
3. Tap on the specific transaction.
4. Scroll to the bottom of the screen and tap on 'Order Confirmation Note'.
Confirmation notes will be made available through the GXS Bank app no later than 1 business day after each successful completion of an order. You will receive an email and/or push notification once your confirmation note is ready.

Title: When will I receive my referral cashback reward and where will it be credited? - GXS Help Centre

Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

For Referrers and Referees who are both GXS Savings Account and GXS FlexiLoan customers, cashback reward will be credited into the Main Account of your GXS Savings Account on or before 31 July 2025; and
For Referrers and Referees who are GXS FlexiCard customers and do not maintain a GXS Savings Account, cashback reward will be credited into your GXS FlexiCard account on or before 31 July 2025.

Title: How do I top up my GrabPay Wallet with my GXS Savings Account? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Grab_and_Singtel_Experiences/GXS_on_Grab/How_do_I_top_up_my_GrabPay_Wallet_with_my_GXS_Savings_Account%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:34:25.832566
Word Count: 142
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

We're working on making top-ups to your GrabPay Wallet easy peasy. Here's how you can top up your GrabPay Wallet with your GXS Savings Account:
First, get the VPA link from Grab app. Here's how:
From your Grab app home screen, tap on your GrabPay Wallet balance.
Tap on 'Top Up'.
From the Top Up menu, tap on 'Banking app'Â > PayNow VPAÂ (If you are doing this for the first time, you should receive a prompt about linking your VPA. Tap on Next > Link VPA).
Select 'PayNow VPA'.
Select 'Other Banks'.
Copy VPA.
Next, send money from your GXS Bank app using the VPA link:
On your GXS Bank app home screen, tap on 'Send Money'.
Select 'VPA'.
Paste the copied VPA in the top bar.
Enter your top-up amount and send.
Top up to your GrabPay Wallet is done!

Title: How do I file an insurance claim under the Group Personal Accident coverage? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/Complimentary_SingLife_Insurance/How_do_I_file_an_insurance_claim_under_the_Group_Personal_Accident_coverage%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:34:28.751760
Word Count: 348
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Please be informed that Singlife must be given written notice of any claims for accidental injury within 30 days of the date of the accident. Any written notice given by or on behalf of you (as the Insured Member) containing sufficient particulars for Singlife to identify you is considered sufficient notice. Â If the notice is not given to Singlife within the requisite time (within 30 days of the date of the accident), Singlife may Â accept submission of a claim if it can be shown that it was not reasonably possible to give such notice and that notice was given to Singlife as soon as it was reasonably possible.
If you have a GXS Invest account and would like to file an insurance claim, do follow these steps:
Step 1: Submit all claims forms and supporting documents to
managed_care3@singlife.com
within the 30 days of the date of the accident. The relevant claim forms can be downloaded from
https://singlife.com/en/claims/emplo...surance-claims
Singlife will require any or all of the following:
1) Certificates, medical reports, information and evidence in such form and nature as Singlife may prescribe;
2) Evidence to establish the continuing health condition of the Insured Member;
3) That the Insured Member be available for examination by Singlifeâ€™s approved Registered Medical Practitioner when required and if the Insured Member is residing outside Singapore, Singlife may still require him to come to Singapore for such medical examination;
4) Proof of the Insured Memberâ€™s date of birth
For processing of a claim for death as a result of Accidental Injury, Singlife has Â the right to require an autopsy to be performed provided that such autopsy is not forbidden by law.
Kindly note this will be at your own cost.
Step 2: Â Singlife will validate with GXS Bank whether you held any investments with GXS Bank on the date of the accident.
Step 3: Once Singlife has assessed and confirmed your eligibility and approved your claim, the benefits will be paid directly to you (or your legal representative) via a cheque by Singlife.
For more details, please refer to the 'Singlife Insurance Product Summary'

Title: I see 2 sections under the â€˜Send Moneyâ€™ screen. What is â€˜Recentâ€™ and what is â€˜Favouriteâ€™? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/GXS_Biz_Account_Payments/I_see_2_sections_under_the_%E2%80%98Send_Money%E2%80%99_screen._What_is_%E2%80%98Recent%E2%80%99_and_what_is_%E2%80%98Favourite%E2%80%99%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:34:52.125815
Word Count: 100
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

The 'Recent' tab shows all the recipients you recently transferred funds to. This includes transfers performed via FAST, PayNow and Scan and Pay. Your recent recipients are shown in chronological order, with the most recent transfer listed at the top.
To add a recent recipient as 'Favourite', simply select a recipient from the 'Recent' tab. Then tap on the star icon, type in a preferred name for the recipient and save as Favourite. This recipient will now be shown in the 'Favourite' tab.
You can now initiate a fund transfer to a 'Recent' or 'Favourite' recipient with a single tap!

Title: Am I able to apply for a GXS Biz Account from my Grab Merchant app? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/?title=GXS_Biz_Account/Grab_%26_Singtel_Experiences/Am_I_able_to_apply_for_a_GXS_Biz_Account_from_my_Grab_Merchant_app%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:35:34.792339
Word Count: 277
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Currently, GXS Biz Accounts can only be applied for via the GXS Bank app.
To apply for a GXS Biz Account:
Download the GXS Bank app from the App Store or Play Store.
Launch the app and tap on 'GXS Biz Account - Sign up now'.
Follow the on-screen instructions.
You'll need to:
Be at least 18 years old.
Have a residential address in Singapore.
Be a Singapore citizen or Singapore Permanent Resident.
Have a Singpass Myinfo account.
Have an active ACRA registration account.
Not currently hold, and never have held, a GXS Savings Account, GXS FlexiLoan account, or GXS FlexiCard.
Not currently hold, and never have held, a GXS Biz Account or a GXS FlexiLoan Biz account.
Note - we currently do not accept applications from US citizens or residents. If we require additional documents, we will email you or send you a notification on the GXS Bank app.
Your GXS Biz Account will be opened shortly after your documents have been reviewed and approved. We would like to share that your deposits with GXS Bank are aggregated and insured up to S$100,000 by the Singapore Deposit Insurance Corporation (SDIC).
If you require assistance on your Singpass access, you may contact Singpass Helpdesk directly.
Switching your Grab Merchant settlement account to GXS Biz Account:
Once your GXS Biz Account is opened, log in to your Grab Merchant profile.
On the home page, tap on the 'GXS Banking' tile.
Select 'Switch to GXS Biz Account' and follow the instructions.
Please note that it may take around 3 business days for the GXS Biz Account to show up on your Grab Merchant app as your Grab settlement account.

================================================================================

================================================================================

Removing a Favourite from your recent recipient list:
To remove a Favourite recipient, open your GXS Bank app. Tap on "Send Money" and "â­" on the recipient tile. Then, confirm your removal.
Once your Favourite recipient removal is successful, the recipient will be removed from your Favourite list. Do note that you will not be able to remove your Favourite recipient immediately after transacting with them. Head to the Favourites tab and slide over the recipient's tile to remove them from the list.

Title: What can I do to protect my mobile device? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Keeping_Your_Data_and_Device_Secure/What_can_I_do_to_protect_my_mobile_device%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:35:53.206491
Word Count: 97
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Here are 3 ways you can protect your mobile device:
Set up automatic updates for your device's applications and operating systems. This is to ensure you have the newest security patches and bug fixes to secure your device and data
Download apps only from the official Google Play Store or the Apple App Store. Be sure to read the reviews and ratings too. Unverified or unsupported apps can be carriers of security vulnerabilities.
Lastly, do not set passwords that are easy to guess or are related to your personal details, such as your birthday or NRIC number.

Title: What is the level of coverage provided under the Group Personal Accident coverage? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/Complimentary_SingLife_Insurance/What_is_the_level_of_coverage_provided_under_the_Group_Personal_Accident_coverage%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:36:23.625778
Word Count: 69
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

You will be covered for a sum assured of up to three times the value of your investment value in the Fullerton SGD Cash Fund (Share Class G) on the date of accident, subject to a maximum of S$100,000.
Should you be 64 years old and above at the time of accident, your sum assured shall be reduced to 50% of benefits payable, subject to a maximum of S$50,000.

Title: How do I apply for a GXS Biz Account? - GXS Help Centre

Thank you for your support!
The GXS Biz Account is currently available for sole proprietors and Private Limited companies.
To apply, simply download the GXS Bank app through the iOS App Store or Google Play Store. Launch the app and select 'Business banking'. After which, tap on 'Sign up' and we will guide you the rest of the way.
You'll need to:
Be at least 18 years old.
Have a residential address in Singapore.
Be a Singapore citizen or Singapore Permanent Resident.
Have a Singpass Myinfo account.
Have an active ACRA registration account.
Not currently hold, and never have held, a GXS Savings Account, GXS FlexiLoan Account, or GXS FlexiCard.
Not currently hold, and never have held, a GXS Biz Account or a GXS FlexiLoan Biz.
Do note: We currently do not accept applications from US citizens or residents. If we require additional documents, we will email or send you a notification on the GXS Bank app. Your GXS Biz Account will be opened shortly after your documents have been reviewed and approved.
We would like to share that your deposits with GXS Bank are aggregated and insured up to S$100,000 by the Singapore Deposit Insurance Corporation (SDIC).

Singpass Helpdesk
directly.

Title: Can I make multiple deposits to reach the S$100,000 requirement? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/GXS_Biz_Account_2025_Year-End_Promotion/Can_I_make_multiple_deposits_to_reach_the_S%24100%2C000_requirement%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:36:46.927853
Word Count: 45
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Yes. For new customers, your 60-day period will begin on the day your total account balance first meets or exceeds S$100,000. For existing customers, your 60-day period will begin on the day you deposit a total of S$100,000 in fresh funds within the campaign period.

Title: What's the difference between the daily transfer limit on the GXS app, and the daily transaction limit for my linked GXS Savings Account on the Grab app? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Grab_and_Singtel_Experiences/GXS_on_Grab/What's_the_difference_between_the_daily_transfer_limit_on_the_GXS_app%2C_and_the_daily_transaction_limit_for_my_linked_GXS_Savings_Account_on_the_Grab_app%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:36:50.035579
Word Count: 83
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Daily transfer limit on GXS Bank app:
This refers to the daily amount you can transfer from your GXS Savings Account to other bank accounts, through the various modes of transfer (e.g. PayNow, local bank transfers).
Daily transaction limit for linked GXS Savings Account on Grab app:
This refers to the total daily transactions you can make from your GXS Savings Account on Grab app, including top ups to your GrabPay Wallet.
Please note that the transfer and transaction limits are not related.

================================================================================

Title: When can I place an order and when will it be processed? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/GXS_Invest_Orders/When_can_I_place_an_order_and_when_will_it_be_processed%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:37:05.001820
Word Count: 84
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

You can place a Buy or Sell order on the GXS Bank app at a time of your convenience.
Orders placed before 3:30PM on a business day will be processed on the same day.
Orders placed after 3:30PM on a business day or orders received on a non-business day will be processed the next business day.
You can view the order status and estimated order completion date by tapping 'Transactions' on the GXS Invest home screen and selecting the relevant Buy or Sell order.

Title: What are the conditions to earn cash credit under the GXS Business Banking CNY2025 Cashback Campaign? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz/Chinese_New_Year_2025_Campaign/What_are_the_conditions_to_earn_cash_credit_under_the_GXS_Business_Banking_CNY2025_Cashback_Campaign%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:37:11.205067
Word Count: 241
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

The GXS Business Banking CNY2025 Cashback Campaign is open to all new and existing sole proprietors to GXS Business Banking.
Simply open or hold a GXS Biz Account and deposit fresh funds of minimum S$10,000 by 28 February 2025, and ensure a day end balance of at least S$10,000 on 31 May 2025.
You will earn a S$88 cashback reward, which will be deposited to your GXS Biz Account by 30 June 2025.
OR
You can open or hold a GXS FlexiLoan Biz account and take a loan by 28 February 2025. Here are the different cashback rewards you can earn:
Important thing to note! You will need to maintain more than 50% of your loan amount three months from the date you first took the loan.
The cashback reward will be credited to your GXS Biz Account by 30 June 2025!
Conditions
Do note that each customer will be eligible for one cashback reward only (of the higherÂ value). And the cash reward is limited to the first 500 eligible customers.
Example
On 25 February 2025, you deposit fresh funds of S$15,000 into your GXS Biz Account and maintain the funds until 31 May 2025.
On the same day, you also borrow a loan for S$20,000 and maintain 50% of the loan till 25 May 2025.
You will be eligible to earn 1 reward - S$388 (higher reward value)
For the full promotion Terms and Conditions, do refer
here
.

Title: How do I reset my GXS Bank app passcode? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Using_the_App/How_do_I_reset_my_GXS_Bank_app_passcode%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:37:20.944340
Word Count: 150
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

If you've forgotten your passcode,
There are 2 ways to reset your passcode on the GXS Bank app:
On your current device:
1. On the login screen, tap 'Forgot Passcode?'
2. You will be prompted to verify your identity on Singpass before you can reset your passcode.
3. After logging into GXS, you will then be required to create a new GXS passcode.
On a new device:
Verify your identity via Singpass. An OTP will be sent to your registered email address.
Tap 'Forgot Passcode?'
Key in the OTP that is sent to your registered mobile number and you can reset your passcode.
If you'd just like to change your passcode,
Tap 'Me'.
Select 'Change Passcode' under 'Settings'.
You will need to key in your current passcode before you can update to a new one.
If you are encountering issues with your Singpass login, do have a read
here
.

3. Review your order details on the order summary page.
4. Acknowledge that you have read the Invest Account Terms, Fund Documents, and Risk Disclosures.
5. Tap â€˜Buyâ€™ to complete the purchase.

Title: How is the annual management fee charged and reflected in the Unit Price of the Fullerton SGD Cash Fund? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/Fees_and_Charges/How_is_the_annual_management_fee_charged_and_reflected_in_the_Unit_Price_of_the_Fullerton_SGD_Cash_Fund%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:37:37.876328
Word Count: 58
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

The annual management fee is already factored into the Fundâ€™s Unit Price on every dealing day, and no further deductions are made when fund units are bought or sold.
For example, If the unit price on a given day is S$1.2008, the redemption proceeds you will receive from selling 1,000 units is exactly S$1,200.80 without any other charges.

here
.
* The Effective Interest Rate (EIR) is the rate that reflects the true cost of borrowing and takes into account total charges. It's computed over a reducing balance basis and accrued daily.

Title: How can I safeguard my data? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Introductions/Keeping_Your_Data_and_Device_Secure/How_can_I_safeguard_my_data%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:38:05.690117
Word Count: 107
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Scammers adapt their tactics to different victims, so it's important to remain vigilant. Here are some tips to help you avoid online banking scams:
Do not click on links in unsolicited SMSes or emails.
Call us at 1800 866 6685 or (+65) 6866 6685 (from overseas) to verify unsolicited SMSes or emails.
Never ever share your banking details or passwords with anyone.
Secure your device with a strong password to prevent unauthorised access.
Turn on your mobile notifications to be alerted on any account activities. You should also check your transaction records regularly so that any unauthorised transactions can be prevented or reported as soon as possible.

Title: What is the Fullerton SGD Cash Fund - Class G and how does it differ from the other classes of the same fund? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/GXS_Invest_Features/What_is_the_Fullerton_SGD_Cash_Fund_-_Class_G_and_how_does_it_differ_from_the_other_classes_of_the_same_fund%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:38:18.064193
Word Count: 110
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Unit trusts often offer several share classes to investors. Each class invests in the exact same portfolio of securities and has the same investment objectives. However, features such as launch dates and distribution channels can differ.
Class G is available for subscription exclusively through GXS Bank (with the additional feature of complimentary group personal accident insurance cover, underwritten by Singapore Life Ltd.)
Please refer to the respective fund share class factsheet available on Fullertonâ€™s
website
These differences reflect the unique servicing arrangements and distribution partnerships for each share class. Nonetheless, regardless of share class, investors across all share classes will benefit from Fullertonâ€™s disciplined approach in their cash management strategy.

================================================================================

Logging in to your GXS Bank app is simple!
On a new device
Open the GXS Bank app and follow the onscreen instructions. To access your account, youâ€™ll have to verify your identity via Singpass, email OTP and passcode. The good news is youâ€™ll only have to do this once on a new device. After verification, your device becomes a registered device and future logins will be quick and easy. Do note that you can only have one registered device at any one time.
On your registered device
Open the GXS Bank app and key in your 6-digit passcode. You can also use Face ID or Touch ID to log in if your device has that function.

here
.

Title: What does each value in my investment holdings details mean? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Invest/GXS_Invest_Features/What_does_each_value_in_my_investment_holdings_details_mean%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:38:35.849945
Word Count: 192
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

â€˜Current valueâ€™
reflects the value of your unit holdings multiplied by the latest published unit price.
Current value = Unit holdings x Unit price
For example: 1,000 unit holdings x S$1.203 unit price = S$1,203 current value
If you have an ongoing â€˜Buyâ€™ order, your allocated units will be ready for viewing in your account when the order is indicated as â€˜Completedâ€™.
If you have an ongoing â€˜Sell orderâ€™, your units will be removed from your account when the order is indicated as 'Confirmedâ€™.
â€˜Total returnsâ€™
represents the total cumulative gain or loss since your first investment. It is the sum of returns from your existing investment holdings (unrealised returns) and returns from investments you have sold (realised returns).
Returns from units held is the profit (or loss) from the investments you still own.
Returns from units sold is the profit (or loss) from the investments you have already sold.
â€˜Unit holdingsâ€™
represents the total number of units in the fund that you own. It is also the number of units you have available to sell.
â€˜Unit priceâ€™
is the latest published price per unit (or Net Asset Value) of the fund.

================================================================================

Title: How are fresh funds calculated? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/Pocket_is_Right_campaign/How_are_fresh_funds_calculated%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:38:38.929337
Word Count: 25
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Fresh funds is the incremental amount of balances in your GXS Savings Account over the total balances in your account as of 31 March 2025.

================================================================================

Title: How long do I need to hold the funds for in my GXS Biz Account? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/GXS_Biz_Account_2025_Year-End_Promotion/How_long_do_I_need_to_hold_the_funds_for_in_my_GXS_Biz_Account%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:38:41.995921
Word Count: 73
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

To qualify for the reward under this campaign, you will need to hold the funds for at least 60 days in your GXS Biz Account from and including the date of depositing funds. Funds must be deposited between 11 November and 31 December 2025.
For example, if you deposit your funds on 15 December 2025, you will need to hold the funds until 13 February 2026 in order to qualify for the reward.

================================================================================

Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:38:44.924048
Word Count: 23
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

No, you will not be able to use your GXS Savings Account to pay on the Dash app for services outside of Singapore.

================================================================================

Title: How do I request an audit confirmation? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz/Manage_GXS_FlexiLoan_Biz/How_do_I_request_an_audit_confirmation%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:38:56.691185
Word Count: 99
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

You can request an audit confirmation "Submit an enquiry" via the Help Centre on the GXS Bank app. Only the authorised person can make this request.
To submit your request, provide:
Date for the audit confirmation.
Name and email address of your auditor.
(Optional) Auditorâ€™s reference number.
Once processed, the confirmation report will be emailed to you. The report is password-protected, so ensure you share the password with your auditor.
Requests might be rejected if it is not from the authorised user, or if duplicate requests are made for the same period. If thereâ€™s a problem, youâ€™ll be notified.

Title: How do I close my GXS Biz Account? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/GXS_Biz_Account/Close_GXS_Biz_Accoun/How_do_I_close_my_GXS_Biz_Account%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:39:07.827276
Word Count: 112
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Weâ€™re sad to see you go. Before closing your GXS Biz Account, do remember to transfer any remaining account balance to another bank account.
Do note you will not be able to reinstate or reapply for a GXS Biz Account once you've closed your account.
We also encourage you to download all/any monthly statements as you may no longer be able to access the GXS Bank app once your account is closed.
Once you've done this, reach out to us to close your GXS Biz Account. Our Customer Support Team is available everydayÂ via:
GXS Bank app, Help Centre: GXS Chat
GXS Hotline: 1800 866 6685Â or (+65) 6866 6685 (from overseas)

Title: What are fresh funds and how is it calculated? - GXS Help Centre
URL: https://help.gxs.com.sg/Promotions/Pocket_is_Right_campaign/What_are_fresh_funds_and_how_is_it_calculated%3F#elm-main-content
Scraped: 2025-11-28T02:39:10.693439
Word Count: 66
Is FAQ Answer: True

================================================================================

Fresh funds means funds not transferred or withdrawn from any existing GXS Savings Account (i.e. not transferred from a Main Account, any Saving Pocket, or any Boost Pocket), and re-deposited into your GXS Savings Account.
For this Campaign, fresh funds will be the incremental amount of balances in your GXS Savings Account over the total balances in your GXS Savings Account as of 31 March 2025.

================================================================================

================================================================================

You can't change your PayNow name. When you link a PayNow proxy to your GXS Biz Account, your company name is used as the name. This is ensure clarity and accuracy customer payments.
